programme.title: Swamp People: Serpent Invasion
programme.desc: 'King of the Swamp' Troy Landry teaches long time alligator hunting partner Pickle Wheat the ins and outs of python hunting, but sometimes even the most experienced hunters walk away with scars. Meanwhile, veteran snake hunter Bill Booth and Florida hunter Tes Lee must learn to work as a team if they hope to put a dent in the growing python population. Zak and newcomer Aaron hunt pythons in an ancient canal system and almost get in over their heads. Dusty Crum finds the fight for the Everglades knocking at his front door.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Take a look inside the doors of a family-run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family, grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colourful customers bring in, objects ranging from the obscure to the truly historic.

The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Detective Harry Callahan probes the murders on a celebrity list that sickos bet on to pick who will die next. When he hears he's on the list, it gets deadly serious.

programme.title: U.S. Marshals
programme.desc: We are initiating a hard-target search for a fugitive in an ever-widening perimeter. We will navigate swamps, prowl Manhattan streets, search every house and doghouse. And since Marshal Sam Gerard leads the hunt, we will experience suspense, action and daring twists every step of the way.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: A gentle giant of a prisoner with supernatural powers brings a sense of spirit and humanity to the guards and inmates on death row.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: A gentle giant of a prisoner with supernatural powers brings a sense of spirit and humanity to the guards and inmates on death row.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part III
programme.desc: A bad guy from the original Karate Kid plots revenge on young Daniel and his mentor Miyagi after they defeat his karate school and ruin his business.

programme.title: Footloose (1984)
programme.desc: Teenager Ren moves from Chicago with his family to a small town in the west, and he's in for a real case of culture shock. Led by the Reverend Shaw Moore, the people of Bomont want to out Ren as a troublemaker. The reverend's daughter Ariel doesn't quite see Ren in that light and they begin a clandestine relationship. Ren decides that this town needs a shake up: it needs to dance.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA analyst Jack Ryan travels to London with his wife and child. Upon being caught in the middle of a terrorist attack on a member of the royal family, Ryan helps to thwart the assailants. Ryan's courageous act, however, marks him and his family as a target for revenge in the sights of the terrorist whose brother Ryan killed.

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Detective Harry Callahan probes the murders on a celebrity list that sickos bet on to pick who will die next. When he hears he's on the list, it gets deadly serious.

programme.title: U.S. Marshals

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: A gentle giant of a prisoner with supernatural powers brings a sense of spirit and humanity to the guards and inmates on death row.

programme.title: Dead Calm
programme.desc: Take an ocean voyage of full-masted fright in this chilling masterpiece. Joe and Rae Ingham do the right thing and rescue the half-delirious sole survivor of a crippled schooner. But soon the stranger will plunge the unwary pair into an intense battle of cat and mouse - and life or death.

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: Fourteen years after being imprisoned, vicious psychopath Max Cady emerges with a single-minded mission: to seek revenge on his attorney Sam Bowden. Cady becomes a terrifying presence as he menacingly circles Bowden's increasingly unstable family. Realising he is legally powerless to protect his beautiful wife Leigh and his troubled teenage daughter Danielle, Sam resorts to unorthodox measures which lead to an unforgettable showdown on Cape Fear.

programme.title: Kelly's Heroes
programme.desc: A group of US soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

programme.title: The Jackal
programme.desc: An FBI director works with a Russian agent and a jailed terrorist to hunt down the elusive Jackal, a master-of-disguise assassin on a deadly mission.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Thrill-seeking meteorologists are chasing the most destructive tornado in 50 years.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Thrill-seeking meteorologists are chasing the most destructive tornado in 50 years.

programme.title: Cape Fear

Cady becomes a terrifying presence as he menacingly circles Bowden's increasingly unstable family. Realising he is legally powerless to protect his beautiful wife Leigh and his troubled teenage daughter Danielle, Sam resorts to unorthodox measures which lead to an unforgettable showdown on Cape Fear.

programme.title: Drop Dead Fred
programme.desc: Every kid has an imaginary friend. Only Elizabeth isnt a kid and Drop Dead Fred is anything but imaginary. With a haircut this bad, he has to be real - and his mischief has Elizabeth in big trouble. When she splits with her husband, Elizabeth turns to her best friend. But it's her mum who sends her back home where she discovers her childhood friend, Fred. Having been locked in a box for 21 years, Fred is bursting with energy to turn Elizabeth's life into a rowdy, rollicking, racy adventure.

programme.title: Kelly's Heroes
programme.desc: A group of US soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

programme.title: The Jackal
programme.desc: An FBI director works with a Russian agent and a jailed terrorist to hunt down the elusive Jackal, a master-of-disguise assassin on a deadly mission.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Thrill-seeking meteorologists are chasing the most destructive tornado in 50 years.

programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.desc: Karen Blixen establishes a plantation in Africa. Meeting her true love, Denys, allows her to rethink her priorities in the midst of this vast land.

programme.title: Every Which Way But Loose
programme.desc: Philo Beddoe likes beer, brawling and country music. When he falls for a sexy singer, he sets out to win her with Clyde his orangutan in tow.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.

programme.title: The Replacement Killers
programme.desc: International superstar Chow Yun-Fat makes his Hollywood debut with Oscar (R) winner Mira Sorvino in THE REPLACEMENT KILLERS, a fierce and explosive action thriller from director Antoine Fuqua. After he betrays Mr Wei, the ruthless crime boss who hired him to avenge his son's death, professional killer John Lee (chow Yun-Fat) goes on the run. Enlisting the aid of beautiful document forger Meg Coburn (Mira Sorvino), Lee attempts to return to his family in China before they are victimised by his betrayal. But Wei's army of "replacement killers" is hot on his trail, and now both he and Meg are targets of their impressive firepower. With both sides fully armed and determined to fight to the death, an ultra-violent shootout breaks out when they finally face off against each other.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: Mismatched detective duo Riggs and Murtaugh are onto a gang using diplomatic immunity to traffic in cocaine.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A projectionist allows 11-year-old boy Danny to a private midnight preview of the latest movie featuring his idol and superhero, Jack Slater. A magic ticket transports the boy into the film, where he helps his hero chase the baddie, who in turn breaks through the screen to wreak havoc in real-life, with the help of an evil sidekick.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A projectionist allows 11-year-old boy Danny to a private midnight preview of the latest movie featuring his idol and superhero, Jack Slater. A magic ticket transports the boy into the film, where he helps his hero chase the baddie, who in turn breaks through the screen to wreak havoc in real-life, with the help of an evil sidekick.

programme.title: Batman (1989)
programme.desc: After witnessing the brutal murder of his parents as a child, millionaire philanthropist Bruce Wayne pledges his life to fighting crime disguised as Batman. His long-time nemesis, The Joker, has sinister plans for the citizens of Gotham City. The Joker's greed is matched by his obsession with photojournalist Vicki Vale. Batman is there to counter the Joker's every move. With the fate of Gotham and Vicki in the balance, will good or evil prevail?

programme.title: Meatballs
programme.desc: The wackiest head counsellor in North Star camp history, Tripper Harrison devotes his summer activities to cracking jokes, chasing female staffers, and plotting the demise of their evil rich rivals, the snotty young brats at nearby Camp Mohawk. Jam-packed with hysterical off-the-wall hjinks, drop-dead gorgeous babes in the woods and the riotous one-liners, Meatballs is an "Animal House goes to summer camp".

programme.title: Flying High
programme.desc: An ex-fighter pilot is forced to take over the controls of an airliner when the flight crew succumbs to food poisoning. Their hilarious high jinx spoof airplane disaster flicks, religious zealots, television commercials, and romantic love, the lists whirls by in rapid succession. And the story races from one moment of zany fun to the next!

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: Power company repairman Roy Neary witnesses unidentified flying objects in the skies near his Muncie, Indiana home. The encounter sets into action a startling chain of dramatic events. Trying desperately to understand what he has seen, Neary is increasingly driven to the emotional edge by the governmental cover up that's blocking him. With his wife struggling in vain to understand what is happening as their relationship disintegrates, Neary finds an ally in Jillian Guiler, a woman who has also witnessed nocturnal encounters and whose young son has been abducted by the alien visitors. As Roy and Jillian look for an answer to the extraordinary mystery that has engulfed them, an international team of scientists led by Claude Lacombe, a dedicated French expert on extraordinary phenomena, also pursues the truth. As Lacombe and company seek to understand the phenomenon of the skies and look for a communications break-through, their cosmic detective work reaches from the Indiana plains across the world to a remote hillside in India and then to the one place that holds the answer in an ultimate close encounter.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: After being captured by Turks during the Crusades, Robin of Locksley and a Moor, Azeem, escape back to England where Azeem vows to remain until he repays Robin for saving his life. Meanwhile, Robin's father has been murdered by the Sheriff of Nottingham and when Robin returns home he vows to avenge his father's death. Even though Marian, his childhood friend, cannot help him, he escapes to the Forest of Sherwood where he joins a band of exiled villagers and becomes their leader. With their help he attempts to cleanse the land of the evil that the Sheriff has spread.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: An undercover cop is posing as a kindergarten teacher in order to catch a dangerous criminal. Once he wrangles his young charges, as well as the affections of a beautiful teacher, he prepares for a final showdown with his intended prey in this totally enjoyable action-comedy.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: An undercover cop is posing as a kindergarten teacher in order to catch a dangerous criminal. Once he wrangles his young charges, as well as the affections of a beautiful teacher, he prepares for a final showdown with his intended prey in this totally enjoyable action-comedy.

programme.title: The Craft
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Fairuza Balk and Robin Tunney star in this teen thriller about four private school misfits who form a coven to summon the dark forces they need to wreak havoc on their persecutors. Having just moved to Los Angeles, Sarah (Tunney) is an outsider at St. Benedict's Academy until she meets three other social outcasts. Nancy (Balk), Bonnie (ampbell) and Rochelle (Rachel True) will never fit in with the "in" crowd. Nancy, Bonnie and Rochelle dabble in the occult, and when they notice Sarah has the powers of a natural witch, they talk her into joining their coven. With the addition of a fourth witch they find they can cast spells they couldn't before, and the teenage witches are suddenly not only able to get the attention, praise and love they have long been denied, but also to exact vengeance on classmates, parents and boyfriends. They learn, however, that everything comes with a price. Support cast includes Skeet Ulrich and Rachel True.

programme.title: The Karate Kid (1984)
programme.desc: A new kid in town who is picked on by bullies learns karate and eastern philosophy from Mr Miyagi, and learns how to fight back.

programme.title: Frantic
programme.desc: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: The thrill of the hunt. It's the ultimate drug, and the more intense the rush, the higher the price. Chance, is the target of an evil mercenary who recruits homeless combat veterans for the 'amusement' of his clients, bored tycoons who will pay a half a million dollars to stalk and kill the most challenging prey of them all: Man.

programme.title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: Mel Gibson first made his mark on movie history as heroic loner Max, who drives the roads of outback Australia in an unending search for gasoline. Arrayed against him and the other scraggly defenders of a fuel-depot encampment are the bizarre warriors commanded by The Humungus, notorious for never taking prisoners when they can pulverize them instead. With The Road Warrior on your side, screen action doesn't get any better.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Earth is covered with water and the human race struggles to survive on dilapidated boats and makeshift floating cities. A drifter becomes caught up in the struggle between the evil Deacon and a child's secret key to a wondrous place called "Dryland".

programme.title: Waterworld

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The epic story of love and adventure in a lawless land shows the complex portrayal of the most famous lawman in the Wild West.

programme.title: Easy Rider
programme.desc: Two drugged-out bike riders and a spaced-out lawyer go on an odyssey in search of the real America only to find violence and bigotry.

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Detective Harry Callahan probes the murders on a celebrity list that sickos bet on to pick who will die next. When he hears he's on the list, it gets deadly serious.

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: Two retired, down-on-their-luck outlaws pick up their guns one last time to collect a bounty offered by the vengeful prostitutes of the remote Wyoming town of Big Whiskey. English Bob is an ill-fated interloper, a colourful killer-for-hire. There is also the sly and brutal local sheriff, whose brand of law enforcement ranges from unconventional to ruthless. Big trouble is coming to Big Whiskey.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: An epic tale, set in the Rocky Mountains of Montana in the early 1900s, of three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness and how their lives are affected by love, betrayal and brotherhood. After being discharged, Colonel Ludlow decides to raise his three sons in the wilds of Montana, where they can grow up away from the government and society he has learned to despise. As the brothers set out to fight a war in Europe, suspicion and jealousy threatens to tear apart their once indestructible bond when Susanna enters their lives.

programme.title: The Frighteners
programme.desc: A small-town 'ghostbuster' is in league with the very spirits he's supposed to be exorcising. The scam works well until a powerful spirit goes on a murderous rampage, forcing Frank to find a way to stop the diabolical ghoul in this special-effects-packed supernatural chiller that's so fiendishly entertaining, it's frightening!

programme.title: The Frighteners

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water, another shark terrorises the resort of Amity as it recovers from the first man-eater. Police Chief Brody returns to kill.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: The thriller that scared movie fans everywhere out of the water. Three men undertake a perilous journey to hunt down a great white killer shark.

programme.title: The Dirty Dozen
programme.desc: Twelve American soldiers, all criminals, get a chance at redemption on a killing mission in World War II.

programme.title: The 'Burbs
programme.desc: Suburbanite Ray Peterson's plan for a peaceful vacation is disturbed by a creepy new family on the block in this outrageous suspense-comedy directed by Joe Dante.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A new, technologically superior Soviet nuclear sub, the Red October, is heading for the US coast under the command of Captain Marko Ramius. The American government thinks Ramius is planning to attack. A lone CIA analyst has a different idea: he thinks Ramius is planning to defect, but he has only a few hours to find him and prove it - because the entire Russian naval and air commands are trying to find him, too. The hunt is on.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: An orphaned autistic savant who deciphers a government code in a magazine triggers a national security alarm that makes him an assassin's target.

programme.title: U.S. Marshals
programme.desc: We are initiating a hard-target search for a fugitive in an ever-widening perimeter. We will navigate swamps, prowl Manhattan streets, search every house and doghouse. And since Marshal Sam Gerard leads the hunt, we will experience suspense, action and daring twists every step of the way.

programme.title: Love It Or List It Australia
programme.desc: Can Andrew tempt Aussie larrikin Brendon to move from his great Australian dream in the south-west of Sydney or will Neale manage to convince Michelle to give up on her dream of moving house?

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex visits the Falcon Hotel in Cambridgeshire, run by lifelong hotelier Colin and his daughter Jean; they leased of this 16th-century inn 11 years ago.

programme.title: Selling Houses Australia
programme.desc: Peter's cedar home is dated, but with only a $30k budget, Wendy and Dennis must work magic to entice buyers for a $2 million sale. Can they make it appealing without major renovations?

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Sonali Shah is property shopping in rural Devon with a couple who have a 350,000 pounds budget and high hopes of finding a country home that has a workshop for him and an art studio for her.

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: The end is in sight for Belinda and Lee's two-bed gite but there's the issue of the stairs. Becky and Mark have to think outside the box before they can begin their gite project and May spots some safety issues.

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance

programme.desc: Tony is helicoptered in after coming off a motorbike. Alison was kicked by a horse and broke her leg. Harry crashed on his racing bike.

programme.title: Surgeons: At the Edge of Life
programme.sub-title: Major Trauma - Back From The Brink
programme.desc: Surgeons at Addenbrooke's Major Trauma Centre must operate on a single mum, who has a severed spinal cord, and a critically injured motorcyclist.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Arthur Fitzharris and Bernard McGrath, both born to unmarried mothers in Ireland, uncover false birth records and spend decades searching for their true identities.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Stranded 205,000 miles from Earth in a crippled spacecraft, astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert fight a desperate battle to survive. Meanwhile, at Mission Control, astronaut Ken Mattingly, flight director Gene Kranz and a heroic ground crew race against time - and the odds - to bring them home.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day In The Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of a real-life friendship between beloved neighbour Fred Rogers and journalist Tom Junod.

programme.title: Sound of Metal
programme.desc: When ex-addict Ruben unexpectedly loses his hearing while touring with his girlfriend Lou, he becomes overwhelmed by anxiety and his life is thrown into turmoil. In a group home for Deaf addicts, Ruben must choose between his new Deaf community and the life of sound he left behind.

programme.title: Sound of Metal
programme.desc: When ex-addict Ruben unexpectedly loses his hearing while touring with his girlfriend Lou, he becomes overwhelmed by anxiety and his life is thrown into turmoil. In a group home for Deaf addicts, Ruben must choose between his new Deaf community and the life of sound he left behind.

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: When a writing assignment lands journalist Raoul Duke and sidekick Dr Gonzo in Las Vegas, they decide to make it the ultimate business trip. But before long, business is forgotten and trip has become the key word. Fuelled by a suitcase full of mind-bending pharmaceuticals, Duke and Gonzo set off on a fast and furious ride through non stop neon, surreal surroundings and a crew of the craziest characters. But no matter where misadventure leads them, Duke and Gonzo discover that sometimes going too far is the only way to go.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr Fletcher, but there remains one still submerged who is set to materialise and dominate all the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls, led by the wilful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him, as well as everyone around him, as the walls between his compartments shatter apart.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: In late 16th century Europe, Elizabeth finds her rule openly challenged by the Spanish King Philip II with his powerful army and sea-dominating armada determined to restore England to Catholicism.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Stranded 205,000 miles from Earth in a crippled spacecraft, astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert fight a desperate battle to survive. Meanwhile, at Mission Control, astronaut Ken Mattingly, flight director Gene Kranz and a heroic ground crew race against time - and the odds - to bring them home.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day In The Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of a real-life friendship between beloved neighbour Fred Rogers and journalist Tom Junod.

programme.title: Sound of Metal
programme.desc: When ex-addict Ruben unexpectedly loses his hearing while touring with his girlfriend Lou, he becomes overwhelmed by anxiety and his life is thrown into turmoil. In a group home for Deaf addicts, Ruben must choose between his new Deaf community and the life of sound he left behind.

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Adapted from the Tony Award-winning play of the same name, this film is based on a true story of negotiations between implacable enemies that led to the 1993 Oslo Peace Accords.

programme.title: Honey Boy
programme.desc: From a screenplay by Shia LaBeouf, based on his own experiences, brings to life a young actor's stormy childhood and early adult years as he struggles to reconcile with his father.

programme.title: Contact (1997)
programme.desc: Astronomer Ellie Arroway is a woman of science. Religious scholar Palmer Joss is a man of faith. They're opposite ends of a spectrum, and sudden players on the world stage as the countdown to humanity's greatest journey begins.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life to the expense of his regular one.

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Three best friends attempt to escape their suburban boredom through a life of crime. But these bickering, bumbling thieves are no match for the local 'godfather' who leads them into the biggest heist of their careers.

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: George Jung is the son of Fred, a struggling small business owner. Seeing his family struggle to make ends meet and failing, George vows never to share a similar fate. Moving to California with his friend, Tuna, he finds success by selling marijuana in the 1960s, but ends up in prison for it. He then becomes extremely rich by working with Pablo Escabar by importing cocaine into America, but trouble escalates when the FBI are in pursuit.

programme.title: As Good as it Gets
programme.desc: An antisocial writer, a single mother, and a gay artist become unlikely friends in this comedy-drama.

programme.title: Contact (1997)
programme.desc: Astronomer Ellie Arroway is a woman of science. Religious scholar Palmer Joss is a man of faith. They're opposite ends of a spectrum, and sudden players on the world stage as the countdown to humanity's greatest journey begins.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life to the expense of his regular one.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Winnfield and Vincent Vega are two hitmen out to retrieve a suitcase stolen from their employer, mob boss Marcellus Wallace. Wallace has also asked Vincent to take his wife Mia out a few days later when Wallace himself will be out of town. Butch Coolidge is an ageing boxer who is paid by Wallace to lose his next fight. Honey Bunny and Pumpkin are a couple of young lovers and small time thieves who decide they need a change of venue. The lives of these seemingly unrelated people are woven together in a wildly entertaining and exhilarating motion picture adventure that both thrills and amuses.

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: George Jung is the son of Fred, a struggling small business owner. Seeing his family struggle to make ends meet and failing, George vows never to share a similar fate. Moving to California with his friend, Tuna, he finds success by selling marijuana in the 1960s, but ends up in prison for it. He then becomes extremely rich by working with Pablo Escabar by importing cocaine into America, but trouble escalates when the FBI are in pursuit.

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory
programme.desc: A crackpot New York cabbie lands in trouble after his conspiracy magazine attracts the interest of shady government heavies and leads to five unexplained murders.

programme.title: Seven Years in Tibet
programme.desc: The true story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet. Based on the book Seven Years in Tibet written by Austrian mountaineer Heinrich Harrer on his experiences in Tibet between 1944 and 1951 during the Second World War. The score was composed by John Williams.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: It's Halloween, 1991. Near Gloucester, Massachusetts, the six members of the Andrea Gail, a swordfishing boat, head out to sea for their last trip of the season. Unbeknownst to them, a shockingly brutal storm is slowly gaining steam. Before the National Weather Bureau has a chance to inform the crew of the impending danger, it's too late. The resulting battle with three merging weather fronts, an unheralded natural disaster, is gruelling and tragic. Based on the true-life bestselling novel by Sebastian Junger.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fear and paranoia grip San Francisco as a killer sends terrifying threats and cryptic codes to police and publishers.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Just released from prison, all Rudy Duncan wants is to start a new life with Ashley, the girl of his dreams, whom he met through pen pal letters in prison. But between them and happiness stands her crazy brother, Gabriel, and his motley crew of deadly criminals who think Rudy has some inside information about a casino where he once had a job, a casino Gabriel and his short-fused posse plan to take down. Now, just as Rudy is beginning his new life, he's caught in a high-velocity avalanche of temptations and surprises that could bury him, unless he can artfully dodge them.

programme.desc: Fear and paranoia grip San Francisco as a killer sends terrifying threats and cryptic codes to police and publishers.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Just released from prison, all Rudy Duncan wants is to start a new life with Ashley, the girl of his dreams, whom he met through pen pal letters in prison. But between them and happiness stands her crazy brother, Gabriel, and his motley crew of deadly criminals who think Rudy has some inside information about a casino where he once had a job, a casino Gabriel and his short-fused posse plan to take down. Now, just as Rudy is beginning his new life, he's caught in a high-velocity avalanche of temptations and surprises that could bury him, unless he can artfully dodge them.

programme.title: Dear Evan Hansen
programme.desc: In this film adaptation of the Broadway phenomenon, Evan Hansen is an anxious, isolated high-schooler who aches for understanding and belonging amid the chaos and cruelty of the social media age.

programme.title: Cat Person
programme.desc: When Margot, a college sophomore, goes on a date with the older Robert, she finds that IRL Robert doesn't live up to the Robert she has been flirting with over texts.

programme.title: Everybody's Fine
programme.desc: Frank is a recently retired widower who has planned his first family get-together since his wife's death, and is disappointed when his adult children all cancel on him. Accordingly, and against his doctor's advice, Frank sets out on a cross-country road trip via bus and train to pay surprise visits to all of them.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time... In Hollywood
programme.desc: The highly anticipated 9th film from Quentin Tarantino. In 1969 Los Angeles, during the Charles Manson murders, a TV actor and his stunt double, embark on an odyssey to make a name for themselves in the film industry.

programme.title: Mother!
programme.desc: In this visually arresting psychological thriller, a couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests turn up at their home.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Corporate salesman Steve Butler (Damon) has been dispatched to the rural town of McKinley with his sales partner (Frances McDormand) to offer much-needed relief to the economically hard-hit residents in exchange for drilling rights to their properties. What seems like an easy job for the duo quickly becomes complicated by a respected schoolteacher (Hal Holbrook), a slick environmental activist (Krasinski), and Steve's interest in a local woman (Rosemarie DeWitt). As they grapple with a surprising array of both open hearts and closed doors, the outsiders soon discover the strength of an American small town at a crossroads.

programme.title: Promised Land

programme.title: Dear Evan Hansen

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: The incredible true story of the enigmatic and opportunistic businessman Oskar Schindler, who saved the lives of more than 1100 Jews during the Holocaust. This emotional film chronicles the trials and triumphs of one man who made a difference, and the tribulations of those who survived one of the darkest chapters in human history because of his actions.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: In May 1940, Germany advance into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. In a heroic mission, British and French forces evacuate thousands of soldiers.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time... In Hollywood
programme.desc: The highly anticipated 9th film from Quentin Tarantino. In 1969 Los Angeles, during the Charles Manson murders, a TV actor and his stunt double, embark on an odyssey to make a name for themselves in the film industry.

programme.title: Mother!
programme.desc: In this visually arresting psychological thriller, a couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests turn up at their home.

programme.title: Promised Land

What seems like an easy job for the duo quickly becomes complicated by a respected schoolteacher (Hal Holbrook), a slick environmental activist (Krasinski), and Steve's interest in a local woman (Rosemarie DeWitt). As they grapple with a surprising array of both open hearts and closed doors, the outsiders soon discover the strength of an American small town at a crossroads.

programme.title: The Mule
programme.desc: Earl, a broke man in his 80s, is offered a job that simply requires him to drive. Unbeknownst to Earl, he's just signed on as a drug courier for a Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Elizabeth
programme.desc: This is the critically acclaimed epic of the queen's turbulent and treacherous rise to power. Before the Golden Age, Elizabeth was a passionate and naive girl who came to reign over a land divided by bloody turmoil. Amid palace intrigue and attempted assassinations, the queen is forced to become a cunning strategist while weighing the counsel of her mysterious advisors, thwarting her devious rivals and denying her own desires for the good of her country.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A FedEx systems engineer's ruled-by-the-clock existence abruptly ends when a harrowing plane crash leaves him isolated on a remote island. As Chuck struggles to survive, he finds that his own personal journey has only just begun.

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: A notorious group of criminals continue to baffle police by pulling off perfectly executed bank robberies. They are in and out like clockwork, leaving no evidence behind and laying low in between heists. But when they attempt to pull off one last job with more money at stake than ever before, the crew may find their plans interrupted by a hardened detective who is hell-bent on solving the case.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hanna is a teenage girl. Uniquely, she has the strength, the stamina, and the smarts of a soldier; these come from being raised by her father, an ex-CIA man, in the wilds of Finland. Living a life unlike any other teenager, her upbringing and training have been one and the same, all geared to making her the perfect assassin. The turning point in her adolescence is a sharp one; sent into the world by her father on a mission, Hanna journeys stealthily across Europe while eluding agents dispatched after her by a ruthless intelligence operative with secrets of her own. As she nears her ultimate target, Hanna faces startling revelations about her existence and unexpected questions about her humanity.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Stranded 205,000 miles from Earth in a crippled spacecraft, astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert fight a desperate battle to survive. Meanwhile, at Mission Control, astronaut Ken Mattingly, flight director Gene Kranz and a heroic ground crew race against time - and the odds - to bring them home.

programme.title: Dream Horse
programme.desc: The inspirational true story of Jan Vokes, a Welsh cleaner and bartender, who decides to breed and raise a racehorse.

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Three best friends attempt to escape their suburban boredom through a life of crime. But these bickering, bumbling thieves are no match for the local 'godfather' who leads them into the biggest heist of their careers.

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A murderer is loose on the streets of Manhattan. A diabolical killer whose brutal slayings leave a trail of cryptic messages hidden at the scene of the crime. Clues which only a brilliant mind can interpret. Lincoln Rhyme is a gifted but disabled detective who is assigned to the case as the city becomes gripped with fear. Amelia Donaghy is a feisty, street-smart policewoman, who together with Lincoln, must go inside the mind of this terrifying madman and defeat him at his own game.

programme.title: Se7en
programme.desc: Two cops track a brilliant and elusive killer who orchestrates a string of horrific murders, each kill targeting a practitioner of one of the seven deadly sins.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: April, 1945. As the Allies make their final push in the European Theatre, a battle-hardened army sergeant named Wardaddy commands a Sherman tank and her five-man crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Outnumbered and out-gunned, and with a rookie soldier thrust into their platoon, Wardaddy and his men face overwhelming odds in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fear and paranoia grip San Francisco as a killer sends terrifying threats and cryptic codes to police and publishers.

programme.title: Zodiac

programme.title: Dream Horse
programme.desc: The inspirational true story of Jan Vokes, a Welsh cleaner and bartender, who decides to breed and raise a racehorse.

programme.title: Honey Boy
programme.desc: From a screenplay by Shia LaBeouf, based on his own experiences, brings to life a young actor's stormy childhood and early adult years as he struggles to reconcile with his father.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: The incredible true story of the enigmatic and opportunistic businessman Oskar Schindler, who saved the lives of more than 1100 Jews during the Holocaust. This emotional film chronicles the trials and triumphs of one man who made a difference, and the tribulations of those who survived one of the darkest chapters in human history because of his actions.

Outnumbered and out-gunned, and with a rookie soldier thrust into their platoon, Wardaddy and his men face overwhelming odds in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fear and paranoia grip San Francisco as a killer sends terrifying threats and cryptic codes to police and publishers.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The continuing story of the Crawley family.

programme.title: Jersey Boys
programme.desc: This big screen version of the Broadway musical tells the story of the four young men from the wrong side of the tracks in New Jersey who came together to form the iconic '60s rock group The Four Seasons. Their trials and triumphs are accompanied by the hit songs that influenced a generation and are now being embraced by a new generation of fans through the stage musical.

programme.title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
programme.desc: A masterful adaptation of John le Carre's bestselling novel that redefined the spy thriller. At the height of the Cold War, a precarious operation goes deadly wrong, and the head of British Intelligence wonders if a double agent is leaking vital secrets. Brought out of retirement to expose the potential mole, master spy George Smiley is the only one who can be trusted to expose one of their own. Or can he? As the emotional and physical tolls mount on the high-ranking suspects, Smiley will be forced into the ultimate international spy game where everyone's motives are in question.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A Harvard professor implicated in a murder must unravel an ancient code to expose the greatest conspiracy in history.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: On an autumn night in 2003, Harvard undergrad and computer programming genius Mark Zuckerberg sits down at his computer and heatedly begins working on a new idea. In a fury of blogging and programming, what begins in his dorm room soon becomes a global social network and a revolution in communication. A mere six years and 500 million friends later, Mark Zuckerberg is the youngest billionaire in history, but for this entrepreneur, success leads to both personal and legal complications.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Five former basketball teammates, after 30 years since graduating high school, gather at the lake house where they celebrated their biggest victory to mourn the passing of their late coach. Over the course of the Fourth of July weekend, the five friends realise that just because they've all grown up and started families doesn't mean that they've lost that old spark. Adulthood is what you make of it, and no one at the lake house is eager to be the grown up of the gang.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell for New York City to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office. But Satan sends his youngest and nicest son, Little Nicky, to bring his two treacherous brothers home.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A retired quarterback is forced to lead a team of colourful fellow inmates against the guards in a game of jailhouse football.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Sonny Koufax is a carefree slob trying to save his love life by becoming responsible. He gets the chance when a cute kid turns up needing a father.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Sonny Koufax is a carefree slob trying to save his love life by becoming responsible. He gets the chance when a cute kid turns up needing a father.

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: John Clasky is a devoted dad whose skills as a chef have afforded his family a very upscale life, including a summer home in Malibu and a breathtaking new housekeeper, Flor, who has recently immigrated to L.A. from Mexico, and is trying to find a better life for her remarkable daughter, Cristina, who is rapidly embracing the American way of life. When Flor and Cristina move in with the Claskys for the summer, Flor has to fight for her daughter's soul as she discovers that life in a new country is perilous especially when you're being embraced by an affluent, eccentric American family!

programme.title: Jack and Jill
programme.desc: Jack Sadelste is a successful advertising executive in LA with a gorgeous wife and kids, who dreads one event each year; the arrival of his identical twin sister Jill. Jill's neediness and passive-aggressive behaviour is maddening to Jack, turning his normally tranquil life upside down.is Jack's circumstances spin more out of control when Jill decides to stay and he doesn't believe she'll ever leave.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A harried workaholic, Michael Newman (Adam Sandler) doesn't have time for his wife (Kate Beckinsale) and children, not if he's to impress his ungrateful boss and earn a well-deserved promotion. So when he meets Morty (Christopher Walken), a loopy sales clerk, he gets the answer to his prayers: a magical remote that allows him to bypass life's little distractions with increasingly hysterical results. But as Michael gleefully mutes, skips and scans past his family and his friends, the remote gradually takes over his life and begins to program him, in this fast, funny and out-of-control comedy adventure.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: There's a traitor in the heart of America's most secret spy network, the Impossible Mission Force. He or she is trying to steal IMF's critical agent list which would give America's enemies the names of every covert operative in the world. When a mission goes badly wrong, agent Ethan Hunt (Cruise) is suspected of being the turncoat and becomes a hunted man. With all the might of IMF now turned against him, Hunt must flush out the real traitor - even if that means stealing the secret list himself.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Special Agent Ethan Hunt teams up with the villain's ex-girlfriend to destroy an international conspiracy to sell a deadly virus to the highest bidder.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt must bring down a ruthless villain and rescue his fiancee.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Blamed for the terrorist bombing of the Kremlin, IMF operative Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) is disavowed along with the rest of the agency when the President initiates 'Ghost Protocol'. Left without any resources or backup, Ethan must find a way to clear his agency's name and prevent another attack. To complicate matters further, Ethan is forced to embark on this mission with a team of fellow IMF fugitives whose personal motives he does not fully know.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: With the IMF disbanded, and Ethan out in the cold, the team now faces off against a network of highly skilled special agents, the Syndicate. These highly-trained operatives are hell-bent on creating a new world order through an escalating series of terrorist attacks. Ethan gathers his team and joins forces with disavowed British agent Ilsa Faust, who may or may not be a member of this rogue nation, as the group faces their most impossible mission yet.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: On a dangerous assignment to recover stolen plutonium, Ethan Hunt chooses to save his team over completing the mission, allowing nuclear weapons to fall into the hands of a deadly network of highly-skilled operatives intent on destroying civilization. Now, with the world at risk, Ethan and his IMF team are forced to become reluctant partners with a hard-hitting CIA agent as they race against time to stop the nuclear fallout. There's never been a threat more destructive, stunts so jaw-dropping in the film critics are calling the best "Mission" yet!

programme.title: Artist to Icon
programme.desc: Features interviews with Tom Cruise's stunt coordinator Wade Eastwood, Taps co-star Billy Van Zandt, Interview With The Vampire producer Stephen Woolley, plus many more.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet: To track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity if falls into the wrong hands. Confronted by a mysterious, all-powerful enemy, Ethan is forced to consider that nothing can matter more than his mission - not even the lives of those he cares about most.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Defence lawyers Daniel Kaffee and Joanne Galloway are assigned the case of defending two US soldiers, accused of murdering a fellow soldier who was deemed to have 'broken the code'. Kaffee and Galloway soon run into a brick wall with Col Nathan Jessep, who sees himself as a military 'untouchable'. The accused claim they were obeying orders, and that the death was an accident.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Defence lawyers Daniel Kaffee and Joanne Galloway are assigned the case of defending two US soldiers, accused of murdering a fellow soldier who was deemed to have 'broken the code'. Kaffee and Galloway soon run into a brick wall with Col Nathan Jessep, who sees himself as a military 'untouchable'. The accused claim they were obeying orders, and that the death was an accident.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: A pilot is selected to attend the Top Gun Naval Flying School while also pursuing a relationship with an instructor.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A doctor plunges into an erotic foray that threatens his marriage, and may ensnare him in a murder mystery, after his wife's admission of sexual longings. The story sweeps from doubt and fear to self-discovery and reconciliation.

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: A young gun takes a job in a law firm with connections to the Mafia and is soon caught up in blackmail.

programme.title: Artist to Icon
programme.desc: Features interviews with Tom Cruise's stunt coordinator Wade Eastwood, Taps co-star Billy Van Zandt, Interview With The Vampire producer Stephen Woolley, plus many more.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning

Confronted by a mysterious, all-powerful enemy, Ethan is forced to consider that nothing can matter more than his mission - not even the lives of those he cares about most.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: Thought safely entombed deep beneath the desert, an ancient princess, whose destiny was unjustly taken from her, is awakened in our current day. Her malevolence has grown over millennia and with it come terrors that defy human comprehension.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A doctor plunges into an erotic foray that threatens his marriage, and may ensnare him in a murder mystery, after his wife's admission of sexual longings. The story sweeps from doubt and fear to self-discovery and reconciliation.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: Jack Harper is the lone security repairman stationed on a desolate, nearly-ruined future Earth. When he rescues a beautiful stranger from a downed spacecraft, her arrival triggers a nonstop chain of events that forces him to question everything he knows, and leaves humanity's fate in his hands.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the year 2054, the head of a police unit specialising in pre-crime - the arrest and conviction of murderers before they commit their crime - finds himself accused of a future murder.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: Based on the incredible true story of Barry Seal, a drug-smuggling pilot in the 1980s who was recruited by the CIA to carry out one of the largest covert operations in history.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: War Of The Worlds (2005)
programme.desc: Ray Ferrier is a working class man living in New Jersey. He's estranged from his family, his life isn't in order, and he's too caught up with himself. But the unthinkable and ultimately the unexpected happens to him in an extraordinary sense. His small town life is shaken violently by the arrival of destructive intruders: Aliens which have come in masses to destroy the planet. As they plough through the country in a wave of mass destruction and violence, Ray must come to the defence of his children. As the world must fend for itself by a new and very advanced enemy not of this world, its inhabitants must save humanity from a far greater force than threatens to destroy it.

programme.title: A Few Good Men

Kaffee and Galloway soon run into a brick wall with Col Nathan Jessep, who sees himself as a military 'untouchable'. The accused claim they were obeying orders, and that the death was an accident.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: When an Army Major is framed for treason, Reacher discovers she's the target of a massive government conspiracy and risks everything to take down the corrupt organisation.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the year 2054, the head of a police unit specialising in pre-crime - the arrest and conviction of murderers before they commit their crime - finds himself accused of a future murder.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt must bring down a ruthless villain and rescue his fiancee.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Defence lawyers Daniel Kaffee and Joanne Galloway are assigned the case of defending two US soldiers, accused of murdering a fellow soldier who was deemed to have 'broken the code'. Kaffee and Galloway soon run into a brick wall with Col Nathan Jessep, who sees himself as a military 'untouchable'. The accused claim they were obeying orders, and that the death was an accident.

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: A young gun takes a job in a law firm with connections to the Mafia and is soon caught up in blackmail.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: Based on the incredible true story of Barry Seal, a drug-smuggling pilot in the 1980s who was recruited by the CIA to carry out one of the largest covert operations in history.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the year 2054, the head of a police unit specialising in pre-crime - the arrest and conviction of murderers before they commit their crime - finds himself accused of a future murder.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet: To track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity if falls into the wrong hands. Confronted by a mysterious, all-powerful enemy, Ethan is forced to consider that nothing can matter more than his mission - not even the lives of those he cares about most.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Defence lawyers Daniel Kaffee and Joanne Galloway are assigned the case of defending two US soldiers, accused of murdering a fellow soldier who was deemed to have 'broken the code'. Kaffee and Galloway soon run into a brick wall with Col Nathan Jessep, who sees himself as a military 'untouchable'. The accused claim they were obeying orders, and that the death was an accident.

programme.title: War Of The Worlds (2005)
programme.desc: Ray Ferrier is a working class man living in New Jersey. He's estranged from his family, his life isn't in order, and he's too caught up with himself. But the unthinkable and ultimately the unexpected happens to him in an extraordinary sense. His small town life is shaken violently by the arrival of destructive intruders: Aliens which have come in masses to destroy the planet. As they plough through the country in a wave of mass destruction and violence, Ray must come to the defence of his children. As the world must fend for itself by a new and very advanced enemy not of this world, its inhabitants must save humanity from a far greater force than threatens to destroy it.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A doctor plunges into an erotic foray that threatens his marriage, and may ensnare him in a murder mystery, after his wife's admission of sexual longings. The story sweeps from doubt and fear to self-discovery and reconciliation.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A doctor plunges into an erotic foray that threatens his marriage, and may ensnare him in a murder mystery, after his wife's admission of sexual longings. The story sweeps from doubt and fear to self-discovery and reconciliation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: On a dangerous assignment to recover stolen plutonium, Ethan Hunt chooses to save his team over completing the mission, allowing nuclear weapons to fall into the hands of a deadly network of highly-skilled operatives intent on destroying civilization. Now, with the world at risk, Ethan and his IMF team are forced to become reluctant partners with a hard-hitting CIA agent as they race against time to stop the nuclear fallout. There's never been a threat more destructive, stunts so jaw-dropping in the film critics are calling the best "Mission" yet!

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Special Agent Ethan Hunt teams up with the villain's ex-girlfriend to destroy an international conspiracy to sell a deadly virus to the highest bidder.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: Thought safely entombed deep beneath the desert, an ancient princess, whose destiny was unjustly taken from her, is awakened in our current day. Her malevolence has grown over millennia and with it come terrors that defy human comprehension.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: With the IMF disbanded, and Ethan out in the cold, the team now faces off against a network of highly skilled special agents, the Syndicate. These highly-trained operatives are hell-bent on creating a new world order through an escalating series of terrorist attacks. Ethan gathers his team and joins forces with disavowed British agent Ilsa Faust, who may or may not be a member of this rogue nation, as the group faces their most impossible mission yet.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: Jack Harper is the lone security repairman stationed on a desolate, nearly-ruined future Earth. When he rescues a beautiful stranger from a downed spacecraft, her arrival triggers a nonstop chain of events that forces him to question everything he knows, and leaves humanity's fate in his hands.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: A pilot is selected to attend the Top Gun Naval Flying School while also pursuing a relationship with an instructor.

programme.title: Artist to Icon
programme.desc: Features interviews with Tom Cruise's stunt coordinator Wade Eastwood, Taps co-star Billy Van Zandt, Interview With The Vampire producer Stephen Woolley, plus many more.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: When an Army Major is framed for treason, Reacher discovers she's the target of a massive government conspiracy and risks everything to take down the corrupt organisation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet: To track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity if falls into the wrong hands. Confronted by a mysterious, all-powerful enemy, Ethan is forced to consider that nothing can matter more than his mission - not even the lives of those he cares about most.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the year 2054, the head of a police unit specialising in pre-crime - the arrest and conviction of murderers before they commit their crime - finds himself accused of a future murder.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: It is the year 1250 BC, during the late Bronze Age. Two emerging nations begin to clash after Paris, the Trojan prince, convinces Helen, Queen of Sparta, to leave her husband Menelaus, and sail with him back to Troy. After Menelaus finds out that his wife was taken by the Trojans, he asks his brother Agamemnon to help him get her back. Agamemnon sees this as an opportunity for power. So they set off for Troy with 1000 ships holding 50,000 Greeks. With the help of Achilles, the Greeks are able to fight the never-before-defeated Trojans, but they come to a stop by Hector, Prince of Troy.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: This is the story of a US Navy captain and his crew. They are just beginning to enjoy 48 hours of leave when they receive word to immediately return to duty. On a top-secret assignment, they must disguise themselves as Nazis and infiltrate a severely damaged Nazi U-boat. Once on board, they are to steal the Nazi's top-secret decoding device and sink the sub before the Germans catch on to what's really happening. Their mission is more dangerous and frightening than anything they could have ever imagined, but one which has the power to turn the tide of battle.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: When detectives Ricardo Tubbs and Sonny Crockett are asked to investigate the brutal murders of two federal agents, they find themselves pulled into the lethal world of drug traffickers.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: When detectives Ricardo Tubbs and Sonny Crockett are asked to investigate the brutal murders of two federal agents, they find themselves pulled into the lethal world of drug traffickers.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: After a radioactive spider bite, a nerdy teen develops keen senses and amazing strength.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: Christian Wolff is a math savant with more affinity for numbers than people. Behind the cover of a small-town CPA office, he works as a freelance accountant for some of the world's most dangerous criminal organisations. With the Treasury Department's Crime Enforcement Division, run by Ray King, starting to close in, Christian takes on a legitimate client: a state-of-the-art robotics company where an accounting clerk has discovered a discrepancy involving millions of dollars. But as Christian 'uncooks' the books and gets closer to the truth, it is the body count that starts to rise.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Pulled from the sea with two bullets in his back, Jason Bourne discovers he has the skills of a very dangerous man and no memory of his violent past. Racing to unlock the secret of his own identity, he discovers the deadly truth: he's an elite government agent. To the government, Jason Bourne isn't just their property: he's a malfunctioning $30 million weapon. Lethally trained, built to disappear, he's an agent on the run who has to be taken out. Now, the government's top operative has become its No.1 target.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley, set out to bring down the bad guys. But when a terrible secret is revealed, it makes the Angels targets for assassination.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner has anger management issues. His quiet life as a brilliant research scientist working with ex-girlfriend Betty Ross conceals a painful past. A freak lab accident reveals Bruce's heroic impulses but also unleashes his inner demons. And he becomes the most powerful being on the face of the Earth: a superhero and a monster.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: Cybertron has fallen. When Optimus Prime sends Bumblebee to protect Earth, he begins his journey to become the hero the Universe needs. Crash landing, with no memory of his past, Bumblebee takes refuge in a junkyard disguised as a VW Beetle. Charlie (Hailee Steinfeld), a teenager trying to find her place in the world, discovers and repairs the battle-scarred robot. When the Decepticons forge an alliance with a secret agency led by Agent Burns (John Cena) to hunt down the remaining Autobots, Bumblebee and Charlie team up to protect the world in an action-packed adventure filled with humour and heart that's fun for the whole family.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: For centuries, two races of robotic aliens have waged a war with the fate of the universe at stake. When the battle comes to Earth, all that stands between the evil Decepticons and ultimate power is a clue held by a young teenager, Sam. Unaware that he alone is mankind's last chance for survival, Sam finds himself in a struggle between the Autobots and Decepticons with the world hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: This film re-creates the towering, true story of Alexander the Great, who, in the 4th Century BC, conquered Greece, Persia, Afghanistan and India - 90% of the "Known World." Against massive armies of chariots and elephants, he never lost a battle! Visionary, explorer, and dreamer - he was also a tender son, torn by his mothers burning love and ambition, and desperate for his father's approval. His dream shaped the world we live in today.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: A young boy learns that he has extraordinary powers and is not of this Earth. As a young man, he journeys to discover where he came from and what he was sent here to do. But the hero in him must emerge if he is to save the world from annihilation and become the symbol of hope for all mankind.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: This film is an epic action fantasy that takes us into the vivid imagination of a young girl whose dream world provides the ultimate escape from her darker reality. Unrestrained by the boundaries of time and place, she is free to go where her mind takes her, and her incredible adventures blur the lines between what's real and what is imaginary. She has been locked away against her will, but Babydoll has not lost her will to survive. Determined to fight for her freedom, she urges four other young girls - the reluctant Sweet Pea, the outspoken Rocket, the street-smart Blondie and the fiercely loyal Amber - to band together and try to escape a terrible fate at the hands of their captors, Blue and Madam Gorski, before the mysterious High Roller comes for Babydoll. Led by Babydoll, the girls engage in fantastical warfare against everything from samurais to serpents, with a virtual arsenal at their disposal. Together, they must decide what they are willing to sacrifice in order to stay alive. But with the help of a Wise Man, their unbelievable journey - if they succeed - will set them free.

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: This film is an epic action fantasy that takes us into the vivid imagination of a young girl whose dream world provides the ultimate escape from her darker reality. Unrestrained by the boundaries of time and place, she is free to go where her mind takes her, and her incredible adventures blur the lines between what's real and what is imaginary. She has been locked away against her will, but Babydoll has not lost her will to survive. Determined to fight for her freedom, she urges four other young girls - the reluctant Sweet Pea, the outspoken Rocket, the street-smart Blondie and the fiercely loyal Amber - to band together and try to escape a terrible fate at the hands of their captors, Blue and Madam Gorski, before the mysterious High Roller comes for Babydoll. Led by Babydoll, the girls engage in fantastical warfare against everything from samurais to serpents, with a virtual arsenal at their disposal. Together, they must decide what they are willing to sacrifice in order to stay alive. But with the help of a Wise Man, their unbelievable journey - if they succeed - will set them free.

programme.title: Land of the Dead
programme.desc: Packed with more heart-pounding and blood-curdling thrills than any theatre could show, this special unleashes the ultimate vision of George A Romero's latest living-dead shock-fest.

programme.title: Jarhead: Law Of Return
programme.desc: Major Ronan Jackson, an accomplished fighter pilot for the Israel Defense Forces and son of a U.S. Senator, is shot down while flying through Syrian airspace. After miraculously surviving the crash, Jackson is taken captive by a group of Hezbollah militiamen. A gripping and powerful story packed with hard-hitting action, "Jarhead: Law of Return" follows a squad of elite soldiers, led by Sergeant Dave Flores, as they risk their own lives in the hopes of saving an ally they've never met.

programme.title: Interstellar
programme.desc: With our time on Earth coming to an end, a team of explorers undertakes the most important mission in human history: travelling beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: A talented young getaway driver relies on the beat of his personal soundtrack to be the best in the game. When he meets the girl of his dreams, Baby sees a chance to ditch his criminal life and make a clean getaway. But after being coerced into working for a crime boss, he must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: When a Russian mobster orchestrates a crooked land deal, millions of dollars are up for grabs, drawing in the entire London underworld into a feeding frenzy.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: The story revolves around United Nations employee Gerry Lane, who traverses the world in a race against time to stop a pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatening to decimate humanity itself.

programme.title: Kick-Ass 2
programme.desc: Self-made superhero Kick-Ass and sweet-faced, foul-mouthed assassin Hit Girl try to return to life as 'normal' teenagers, but soon they are faced with their deadliest challenge yet. To seek revenge for his father's death, Red Mist has re-invented himself as the leader of an evil league of super-villains. To defeat their new nemesis, Kick-Ass and Hit Girl must team up with a new wave of masked crusaders, led by the badass Colonel Stars and Stripes, in this battle of real-life villains and heroes.

programme.title: Warcraft: The Beginning
programme.desc: The peaceful realm of Azeroth stands on the brink of war as its civilisation faces a fearsome race of invaders: Orc warriors fleeing their dying home to colonise another. As a portal opens to connect the two worlds, one army faces destruction and the other faces extinction. From opposing sides, two heroes are set on a collision course that will decide the fate of their family, their people and their home. So begins a spectacular saga of power and sacrifice in which war has many faces, and everyone fights for something.

programme.title: The Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret Task Force X as they're dropped off at a remote, enemy-infused island.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: MI6's most lethal assassin is sent on a covert mission into Cold War Berlin where she must use all of the spy-craft, sensuality, and savagery she has to stay alive.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Undercover FBI agent Frank Castle (Thomas Jane) is crushed when his wife and children are killed after accidentally witnessing a mafia hit. With nothing left to lose or to live for, Castle becomes 'The Punisher' a one-man judge, jury and executioner who declares open season on criminals throughout America. Based on the Marvel Comics character, the film also stars John Travolta, Laura Harring, Samantha Mathis and Rebecca Romijn.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Undercover FBI agent Frank Castle (Thomas Jane) is crushed when his wife and children are killed after accidentally witnessing a mafia hit. With nothing left to lose or to live for, Castle becomes 'The Punisher' a one-man judge, jury and executioner who declares open season on criminals throughout America. Based on the Marvel Comics character, the film also stars John Travolta, Laura Harring, Samantha Mathis and Rebecca Romijn.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: When a renegade Kylothian monster disguised as a lingerie model threatens the survival of the human race, the boys of the MIB get the call to step up and get busy. With their headquarters under siege and time running out, Agents K and J enlist the help of Frank the Pug and a posse of hard-living worms to help them kick some seriously sexy alien butt!

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet has a malfunction in its sleep chambers, and as a result two passengers are awakened 90 years too early.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is a broken man after he loses everything including his job and fiancee. Just when his life is at its lowest, he becomes host to an alien symbiote which results in extraordinary superpowers - transforming him into Venom. Will these powers be enough for this new lethal protector to defeat great evil forces, especially against the far stronger and more weaponized symbiote rival, Riot?

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters' leader.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former CIA assassin Jason Bourne resurfaces just as his former employers are implementing a new program aimed at hunting him down. Now fully recovered from his amnesia, Bourne teams up with Nicky Parsons to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: A new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, who's been missing for 30 years.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: This film begins after an epic battle left a great city torn, but with the world saved. As humanity picks up the pieces, a shadowy group reveals itself in an attempt to control the direction of history ... while an ancient, powerful new menace sets Earth in its crosshairs. With help from a new cast of humans, Optimus Prime and the Autobots rise to meet their most fearsome challenge yet. In an incredible adventure, they are swept up in a war of good and evil, ultimately leading to a climactic battle across the world.

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Supplying sophisticated and hugely expensive artificial organs to those in need, multinational company The Union has a virtual monopoly on life and death. Unfortunately, for those who can't keep up the repayments, the firm's repo men are despatched to reclaim company property - no matter the consequences for the customer. After suffering a heart attack on the job, top repo man Remy wakes to find the company have fitted him with the latest heart replacement, along with a sizeable debt repayment. Unable to make the payments, and rapidly losing his taste for the job, Remy goes on the run, teaming up with his former wife, Beth, who is also fleeing the system.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
programme.desc: The city needs heroes. Darkness has settled over New York City as Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April O'Neil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vern Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredder's diabolical plan.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is a broken man after he loses everything including his job and fiancee. Just when his life is at its lowest, he becomes host to an alien symbiote which results in extraordinary superpowers - transforming him into Venom. Will these powers be enough for this new lethal protector to defeat great evil forces, especially against the far stronger and more weaponized symbiote rival, Riot?

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: After failing to fight for his family during a robbery, an unassuming father calls on skills from his hidden past to become a lethal vigilante blazing a wild ride to revenge.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Phillip Noyce directs Angelina Jolie as Evelyn Salt, a CIA officer who swore an oath to duty, honour and country. When she is accused by a defector of being a Russian sleeper spy, Salt goes on the run to clear her name and ultimately prove her loyalty. Using all her skills and years of experience as a covert operative, she must elude capture and protect her family or the world's most powerful forces will erase any trace of her existence. With her superiors convinced she's out to assassinate the president, she also must race the clock to learn the identity of the real traitor.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: MI6's most lethal assassin is sent on a covert mission into Cold War Berlin where she must use all of the spy-craft, sensuality, and savagery she has to stay alive.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: After they are attacked by members of a satanic cult, a couple moves house, only to discover that an evil entity has come with them, attaching itself to a vintage doll called Annabelle.

programme.title: Land of the Dead
programme.desc: Packed with more heart-pounding and blood-curdling thrills than any theatre could show, this special unleashes the ultimate vision of George A Romero's latest living-dead shock-fest.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: The web-spinning superhero must battle his own demons and a barrage of new villains including Sandman and Venom.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crashlanding puts a father and son on a dangerous planet - Earth. Hunted by an alien and by evolved animal species, the pair must work together to survive.

programme.title: Warcraft: The Beginning
