With her superiors convinced she's out to assassinate the president, she also must race the clock to learn the identity of the real traitor.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor 'Sully' Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: This high-octane action-thriller sees two men go back to the streets where it all began as they blast their way across Los Angeles and through the Mexican desert.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Former FBI Hostage Rescue Team leader and U.S. war veteran Will Sawyer now assesses security for skyscrapers. On assignment in Hong Kong he finds the tallest, safest building in the world, The Pearl, suddenly ablaze, and he's been framed for it. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building above the fire line.

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: This film follows Swoff from a sobering stint in boot camp to active duty, where he sports a sniper rifle through Middle East deserts that provide no cover from the heat or Iraqi soldiers. Swoff and his fellow Marines sustain themselves with sardonic humanity and wicked comedy on blazing desert fields in a country they don't understand against an enemy they can't see for a cause they don't fully grasp.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A French drug kingpin offers a huge reward to anyone who can break him out of jail and only the LAPD's Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A French drug kingpin offers a huge reward to anyone who can break him out of jail and only the LAPD's Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: Before there was Amityville, there was Harrisville. This film tells the true story of Ed and Lorraine Warren, world-renowned paranormal investigators, who were called to help a family terrorised by a dark presence in a secluded farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful demonic entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most horrifying case of their lives.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Humans are at war with the Transformers, and Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving the future lies buried in the secrets of the past and the hidden history of Transformers on Earth. Now, it's up to the unlikely alliance of Cade Yeager, Bumblebee, an English lord and an Oxford professor to save the world.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Fearing the actions of a god-like superhero left unchecked, Gotham City's own formidable, forceful vigilante takes on Metropolis's most revered, modern-day saviour, while the world wrestles with what sort of hero it really needs. With Batman and Superman at war with one another, a new threat quickly arises, putting mankind in greater danger than it's ever known before.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Four-hundred years in the future, Aeon Flux is the top underground operative at war with the totalitarian regime governing what appears to be a perfect society. But is this perfect life hiding a perfect lie? Aeon is on the front lines of a rebellion that will reveal a world of secrets.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station have their mission of discovery turn into one of primal fear when they find a rapidly evolving life form that caused extinction on Mars, and now threatens the crew and all life on Earth.

programme.title: The Mummy (1999)
programme.desc: Adventurer Rick O'Connell and Egyptologist Evelyn Carnahan discover the lost city of Hamunaptra, and struggle to save the world from unspeakable evil after they inadvertently stumble upon a mummy's tomb in 1923, and the mummy is accidentally resurrected.

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: This film follows Swoff from a sobering stint in boot camp to active duty, where he sports a sniper rifle through Middle East deserts that provide no cover from the heat or Iraqi soldiers. Swoff and his fellow Marines sustain themselves with sardonic humanity and wicked comedy on blazing desert fields in a country they don't understand against an enemy they can't see for a cause they don't fully grasp.

programme.title: King Kong (2005)
programme.desc: The leading lady in a movie is abducted as a sacrifice for a giant ape in this jaw-dropping, triple Oscar-winning remake of the 1933 classic.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: Christian Wolff is a math savant with more affinity for numbers than people. Behind the cover of a small-town CPA office, he works as a freelance accountant for some of the world's most dangerous criminal organisations. With the Treasury Department's Crime Enforcement Division, run by Ray King, starting to close in, Christian takes on a legitimate client: a state-of-the-art robotics company where an accounting clerk has discovered a discrepancy involving millions of dollars. But as Christian 'uncooks' the books and gets closer to the truth, it is the body count that starts to rise.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: Rocky, a young woman wanting to start a better life for her and her sister, agrees to take part in the robbery of a house owned by a wealthy blind man with her boyfriend Money and their friend Alex. But when the blind man turns out to be a more than he seems, the group must find a way to escape his home before they become his newest victims.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters' leader.

programme.title: Dawn of the Dead
programme.desc: When a mysterious virus turns people into mindless, flesh-eating zombies, a handful of survivors wage a desperate, last-stand battle to stay alive - and human.

programme.title: Dawn of the Dead
programme.desc: When a mysterious virus turns people into mindless, flesh-eating zombies, a handful of survivors wage a desperate, last-stand battle to stay alive - and human.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 5
programme.desc: Dom Toretto and Brian O'Conner lead a reunion of returning all-stars from every chapter of the explosive franchise built on speed to assemble for a high-stakes race that places an unlikely alliance of cops and racers in from Rio de Janeiro. The team must also defeat a corrupt businessman who wants them all dead. A dogged federal agent whose strike team tears through South America in hot pursuit, but soon has a difficult time determining the good men from the bad.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt must bring down a ruthless villain and rescue his fiancee.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Desperate to find their missing son, Paul and his wife Amanda trick eminent palaeontologist Dr Alan Grant into accompanying them to Isla Sorna. The small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance
programme.desc: Lukas, a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge, forming an unlikely trio with a majestic dragon and a swashbuckling, sword-fighting mercenary, Darius. Helena Bonham Carter voices Siveth, the ice breathing dragon who was once banished from the kingdom for failing to save the king's life. Compelled by the young man's cause, she emerges from hiding, using her fantastical powers on the trio's adventurous journey which brings revelations and rewards beyond vengeance. Dragonheart: Vengeance is an exciting action-adventure filled with fantasy and humor that will thrill the entire family.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: When an Army Major is framed for treason, Reacher discovers she's the target of a massive government conspiracy and risks everything to take down the corrupt organisation.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: Rocky, a young woman wanting to start a better life for her and her sister, agrees to take part in the robbery of a house owned by a wealthy blind man with her boyfriend Money and their friend Alex. But when the blind man turns out to be a more than he seems, the group must find a way to escape his home before they become his newest victims.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: This futuristic action thriller relates the details of the spread of the highly infectious Reaper virus, which resulted in the erection of a 30-foot-high wall of reinforced steel to block off the top area of the United Kingdom. More than 25 years later, with a new strain of the virus now threatening an overcrowded London, Major Eden Sinclair is sent to the infected zone to find a cure. Upon arrival, she finds herself confronted by a population gone wild, descended into utter savagery and cannibalism.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: An epic action adventure that pits Godzilla against some of the most popular monsters in pop culture history. The new story follows the heroic efforts of the crypto-zoological agency Monarch as its members face off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah. When these ancient super-species thought to be mere myths rise again, they all vie for supremacy, leaving humanity's very existence hanging in the balance.

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: When a surfer is attacked by a great white shark 20 yards from shore, her short journey back to safety becomes the ultimate contest of wills.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: A system of satellites designed to protect the earth from natural disasters starts to malfunction, but who is responsible and can it be stopped?

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by an oppressive mechanised police force. But now, the people are fighting back. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself. As powerful, destructive forces start to see Chappie as a danger to mankind and order, they will stop at nothing to maintain the status quo and ensure that Chappie is the last of his kind.

programme.title: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: The true meaning of family gets tested like never before as Dom Toretto takes the team on a worldwide ride with high-stakes action, old friends and a surprising new foe.

programme.desc: Mike questions the firing of an executive, whom Harvey dismissed at the request of a client.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: In the wake of the festivities, Laurie finds herself feeling deceived by Jaclyn, while Saxon tries to bury what happened the night before.

programme.title: Dave

programme.title: Dave

programme.title: Mr Inbetween
programme.desc: Gary takes Ray for a drive to give him a surprise as a thank you for saving him. Ray and Ally's relationship has developed. Freddy takes Ray to meet Davros. Ray doesn't like Davros and although Davros seems placated by the end of the conference, Freddy knows better. A road-rage incident forces Ally to confront Ray about his quick access to violence, rather than attempting to diffuse a situation. When court-ordered anger management therapist Peter confronts Ray about the same impulse, Ray explains that it's justifiable to let people clearly know that there are ramifications for being an a******. For Ray, it's all about respect. Ray brings Ally home to meet Brittany. Ray can't sleep and gets up to notice a van parked outside surveilling his house. He goes for a drive and leads the van out to a safe place to do some permanent damage to it's occupants - Davros' guys - using the surprise Gary gave him.

programme.title: Belgravia
programme.desc: Lady Brokenhurst's introduction of Charles Pope to society raises the interest of Lady Brokenhurst's brother-in-law Reverend Stephen Ballasis who has gambling debts of 1000 pounds which his brother, the Earl, refuses to pay. Lady Maria Grey also takes an interest, as does her betrothed John Bellasis, Stephen's son, who begins an affair with the childless Susan Trenchard, which she relies on her maid Speer to keep secret. Susan's husband Oliver is also curious to know why his father, James Trenchard, has invested in Charles's company. John Bellasis decides to enlist the aid of the Trenchards' servants Ellis and Tuton to uncover the family secrets.

programme.title: Wolf Hall
programme.desc: Cromwell manoeuvres a bill through Parliament acknowledging Henry rather than the pope as head of the Church of England. This is the first step in Cromwell's plan for Henry to grant his own divorce from Katherine of Aragon.

programme.title: The White Lotus

programme.title: Wolf Hall
programme.desc: Cromwell manoeuvres a bill through Parliament acknowledging Henry rather than the pope as head of the Church of England. This is the first step in Cromwell's plan for Henry to grant his own divorce from Katherine of Aragon.

programme.title: Something's Gotta Give
programme.desc: Harry Sanborn is a perennial playboy with a libido much younger than his years. During what was to have been a romantic weekend with his latest infatuation, Marin, at her mother's Hamptons beach house, Harry develops chest pains. He winds up being nursed by Marin's reluctant mother, Erica Barry, a successful, divorced New York playwright. In the process, Harry develops more heart pangs - the romantic kind - for Erica, an age-appropriate woman who he finds beguiling. However, some habits die hard. When Harry hesitates, his charming thirty-something doctor steps in and starts to pursue Erica. And Harry, who has always had the world on a string, finds his life unravelling.

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Join Diane Keaton, Bette Midler and Goldie Hawn in this sinfully satisfying revenge romp about a trio of first wives who team up to teach their lying, cheating ex-husbands a lesson. Ivana Trump's galvanising cameo - 'don't get mad, dahlinks, get everytink' - sets the scene in a comedy that hinges on the self-mockery of its ageless stars. Midler's ball-busting shtick, Keaton's ditsy vulnerability and Hawn's eternal youth are just light-hearted grist for the mill of female friendship as a serious source of strength.

programme.title: She's Having a Baby
programme.desc: Jake, a young man terrified of marriage and the adult responsibility that goes along with it. Together Jake and Kristy face nearly every terror of young adulthood, from interfering in-laws and career crises to overextended credit and maintaining a house, but are they up to the perils of impending parenthood?

programme.title: Eat Pray Love
programme.desc: Believing there's more to life than a husband, house and career, Liz Gilbert finds herself with a new appetite for life. She leaves New York and embarks on a yearlong journey, traveling to Italy, India and Bali, seeking self-discovery through good food, meditation and the prospect of finding true love.

programme.title: Vanity Fair
programme.desc: From the classic novel by William Makepeace Thackeray, the daughter of a starving English artist and a French chorus girl, Becky is orphaned at a young age. Even as a child, she yearns for a more glamorous life than her birth right promises. As she leaves Miss Pinkerton's Academy at Chiswick, Becky resolves to conquer English society by any means possible. She deploys all of her wit, guile, and sexuality as she makes her way up into high society during the first quarter of the 19th century.

programme.title: Stepmom
programme.desc: When tragedy strikes, two strong-willed and independent women must put aside their differences and resentments to unite a family in crisis.

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: With a thriving bakery, a new romance and her divorce finally behind her, Jane Adler has her life all figured out, until her ex-husband Jake decides he'll stop at nothing to win her back.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A bodyguard is sent to protect a pop-music diva from a homicidal fan. At first repelled by each other, passion ignites as danger explodes around them.

programme.title: Love Happens
programme.desc: A grieving self-help guru and a recently single florist's lives come crashing together at exactly the wrong time. Does love stand a chance?

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: An old-school anchorman who quit his longtime evening newscast because of its new, gossipy ways is recruited by a hotshot producer who is looking to revive a failing morning show.

programme.title: The American President
programme.desc: Andrew Shepherd is the widowed President of the United States, who decides that it's time to get back into the dating game and falls heavily for a feisty political lobbyist. True romance under the scrutiny of the world's media has a price, and the president's opponents will use anything to discredit him.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: After spending most of their time focusing on their troubling teenage daughter, Toula and Ian are facing marital problems while also having to deal with yet another Greek wedding - this time, even bigger and fatter.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: Hitch is a cocky and successful date doctor for the unlucky in love, but when he falls for gossip columnist Sara, he forgets his own rules.

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: Marisa Ventura is a struggling single mum who works at a posh Manhattan hotel and dreams of a better life for her and her young son. One fateful day, hotel guest and senatorial candidate Christopher Marshall meets Marisa and mistakes her for a wealthy socialite. After an enchanting evening together, the two fall madly in love. When Marisa's true identity is revealed, issues of class and social status threaten to separate them. Can two people from very different worlds overcome their differences and live happily ever after?

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: She's a high school girl from the wrong side of town. He's the wealthy heartthrob who asks her to the prom. But as fast as their romance builds, it's threatened by the painful reality of peer pressure.

programme.title: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: A student is controlled by her wicked stepmother and stepsisters, but her anonymous email buddy is a real Prince Charming. Will she turn into a pumpkin when they finally meet at the school dance?

programme.title: Just Like Heaven
programme.desc: When David sublets his quaint San Francisco apartment, the last thing he expected - or wanted - was a room mate. He had only begun to make a complete mess of the place when a pretty young woman named Elizabeth suddenly shows up, adamantly insisting the apartment is hers. David assumes there's been a giant misunderstanding, until Elizabeth disappears as mysteriously as she appeared. Changing the locks does nothing to deter Elizabeth, who begins to appear and disappear at will.

programme.title: For Love Of The Game
programme.desc: When a legendary pitcher strikes out with his girlfriend, he has to play the game of his life. The suspense lasts until the last ball is thrown in this heartwarming drama.

programme.title: For Love Of The Game

programme.title: The Other Boleyn Girl
programme.desc: Centred around the claustrophobic intrigue that was the court of Henry VIII, this historical drama presents a calculating Anne (Portman), who usurps her older sister Mary (Johansson) as the king's mistress and ultimately desires to be his new queen. A sophisticated and complex study of ambition and deception, this is a compelling and well-acted film made all the more powerful when one remembers the brutal fate of most of Henry's wives. Trivia: At the outset of their relationship with Henry, Mary was characterised as being innocent and morally upright. Actually, she had spent time in France, was reputed to have had several affairs. One of Henry's reasons for not wanting her except as a consort is that she was regarded as promiscuous.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Discover Donna's young life, experiencing the fun she had with the three possible dads of Sophie. Sophie is now pregnant. Like Donna, she'll be a young mother, and she realizes that she'll need to take risks like her mother did.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: A funny, inspiring and uplifting film about an art history professor with a lot to teach about life and much to learn about romance.

programme.title: The Dressmaker
programme.desc: Tilly Dunnage, a beautiful and talented misfit, after many years working as a dressmaker in exclusive Parisian fashion houses, returns home to the tiny middle-of-nowhere town of Dungatar to right the wrongs of the past. Not only does she reconcile with her ailing, eccentric mother, Molly, and unexpectedly falls in love with the pure-hearted Teddy, but armed with her sewing machine and incredible sense of style, she transforms the women of the town, and in doing so gets sweet revenge on those who did her wrong.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

programme.title: Pleasantville
programme.desc: Two modern American teenagers are sucked into their television set and end up living in a black-and-white '50s sitcom.

programme.title: Pleasantville

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: When a wounded Christian Grey tried to entice a cautious Ana Steele back into his life, she demands a new arrangement before she will give him another chance. As the two begin to build trust and find stability, shadowy figures from Christian's past start to circle the couple, determined to destroy their hopes for a future together.

programme.title: Just Go with It
programme.desc: Danny Maccabee meets the girl of his dreams, but has to enlist his loyal assistant Katherine to pretend to be his soon-to-be ex-wife in order to cover up a careless lie. When more lies backfire, Katherine's kids become involved, and everyone heads off to Hawaii for a ridiculous, out-of-control weekend that tests the limits of how far we'll go for love.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: After discovering that retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be, a 70-year-old widower seizes an opportunity to become a senior intern at an online fashion site.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A home-schooled newcomer is introduced to the blackboard jungle, where she joins the social outcasts in a planned sabotage of the cool kids.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Given one weekend to clean out their childhood bedroom before their parents sell their home, two sisters throw one last party.

programme.title: Honey: Rise Up And Dance
programme.desc: Aspiring street dancer Skyler is at a major crossroads in her life. She's decided to try out for the same dance crew as her formally trained sister Tosha in order to compete for a college scholarship, but is discouraged by her family and boyfriend who doubt that her raw, edgy talent is enough for her to win. Determined to prove them all wrong, Skyler practices non-stop in Atlanta's underground dance scene and catches the eye of Tyrell. He helps her take her sexy dance and hip-hop battle skills to the next level in order to achieve her dreams.

programme.title: Honey: Rise Up And Dance
programme.desc: Aspiring street dancer Skyler is at a major crossroads in her life. She's decided to try out for the same dance crew as her formally trained sister Tosha in order to compete for a college scholarship, but is discouraged by her family and boyfriend who doubt that her raw, edgy talent is enough for her to win. Determined to prove them all wrong, Skyler practices non-stop in Atlanta's underground dance scene and catches the eye of Tyrell. He helps her take her sexy dance and hip-hop battle skills to the next level in order to achieve her dreams.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father dies, four grown siblings, bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week.

programme.title: Ladies in Black
programme.desc: Adapted from the bestselling novel by Madeleine St John, Ladies In Black is an alluring and tender-hearted comedy drama about the lives of a group of department store employees in 1959 Sydney.

programme.title: Life Without Dick
programme.desc: Colleen Gibson, heir to the Rose Red Grapefruit fortune, whose cheating boyfriend Dick is coincidently taken out before singing hitman Daniel has a chance to do the job himself. When Daniel and Colleen meet, sparks fly and Daniel soon discovers that his potential new girlfriend is a much better killer than he is.

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: Hedy Carlson and Allie Jones - two women taken to their most primal extremes from which only one can emerge. When Allie throws out her two-timing boyfriend, Hedy suddenly appears to help her fight off the urges to call him back. The surviving half of a set of twins, Hedy seeks someone to complete her, and sees in the chic and articulate Allie everything she would like to be so she not only moves into the apartment, but into the most personal aspects of Allie's life, even going so far as to have her hair styled the same. But when Allie reconciles with her boyfriend, their unspoken bargain goes terrifyingly awry. Instincts don't come baser than this.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Crazy Rich Asians follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu (Constance Wu) as she accompanies her longtime boyfriend, Nick Young (Henry Golding), to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. Excited about visiting Asia for the first time but nervous about meeting Nick's family, Rachel is unprepared to learn that Nick has neglected to mention a few key details about his life. It turns out that he is not only the scion of one of the country's wealthiest families but also one of its most sought-after bachelors. Being on Nick's arm puts a target on Rachel's back, with jealous socialites and, worse, Nick's own disapproving mother (Michelle Yeoh) taking aim. And it soon becomes clear that while money can't buy love, it can definitely complicate things.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Featuring the music of George Michael, this film follows a hapless Londoner who works in a Christmas shop and becomes involved with a man who could be the answer to her problems.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher gives in to temptation when the handsome teenager next door attempts to seduce her. But trouble ensues when she tries to end the relationship.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father dies, four grown siblings, bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You

But when Allie reconciles with her boyfriend, their unspoken bargain goes terrifyingly awry. Instincts don't come baser than this.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: "I was born under unusual circumstances." And so begins this film, adapted from the 1920s story by F. Scott Fitzgerald about a man who is born in his eighties and ages backwards: a man, like any of us, who is unable to stop time. Set in New Orleans, from the end of World War I in 1918 into the 21st century, we follow his journey that is as unusual as any man's life can be. This is a grand tale of a not-so-ordinary man and the people and places he discovers along the way, the loves he finds, the joys of life and the sadness of death, and what lasts beyond time.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Crazy Rich Asians follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu (Constance Wu) as she accompanies her longtime boyfriend, Nick Young (Henry Golding), to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. Excited about visiting Asia for the first time but nervous about meeting Nick's family, Rachel is unprepared to learn that Nick has neglected to mention a few key details about his life. programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Featuring the music of George Michael, this film follows a hapless Londoner who works in a Christmas shop and becomes involved with a man who could be the answer to her problems.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher gives in to temptation when the handsome teenager next door attempts to seduce her. But trouble ensues when she tries to end the relationship.

programme.title: Charlotte Gray
programme.desc: A resourceful Scottish woman signs up with British Intelligence to find her missing pilot lover. Working undercover as a French housekeeper, she becomes drawn to a mysterious Resistance fighter and pursued by a sinister Nazi collaborator, requiring the plucky patriot to dig deep into her reservoirs of self-sacrifice.

programme.title: Tin Cup
programme.desc: A washed-up golf pro takes one last shot at the US Open to win a heart and prove to himself that he's not a loser.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: As teenagers, Allie and Noah begin to fall in love, but they are separated by her upper-class parents who insist that Noah isn't right for her. When they meet years later, their passion is rekindled. Their story is narrated from the present day by an elderly man, telling the tale to a fellow nursing home resident, who is Cassavetes' mother.

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Anna Scott is the world's most famous movie star. Her picture has been plastered on the cover of every magazine, and every time she makes a movie, the entire world knows about it. William Thacker owns a travel bookstore in the quaint neighbourhood of Notting Hill. His business is stagnant, he has the roommate from hell and his love life is completely non-existent. Then one day, their paths cross and the couple comes to face the ultimate question: can two people fall in love with the whole world watching?

programme.title: Mickey Blue Eyes
programme.desc: He walks the wawk. He talks the tawk. Noo Yawk is about to encounter a most unlikely mobster. At the centre of this lively fish-out-of-water comedy romp is a dapper Manhattan art auctioneer named Michael Felgate. Eager to marry Gina, the lovely teacher he's been dating for three months, Michael feels it's time he meet her family. What he meets is the family. Gina's father Frank is a gangster a "juicer" who extracts money for the mob. Now the squeeze is on Michael to use the auction house as a money-laundering scam for dubious artwork, plunging fumbling, bumbling Michael into a world where he must pose as a notorious wise guy called Mickey Blue Eyes. You'll call him hilarious.

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Will Lightman is a good-looking, smooth-talking bachelor whose primary goal in life is avoiding any kind of responsibility. But when he invents an imaginary son in order to meet attractive single mums, Will gets a hilarious lesson about life from a bright, but hopelessly geeky 12-year-old named Marcus. Now, as Will struggles to teach Marcus the art of being cool, Marcus teaches Will that you're never too old to grow up.

programme.title: Charlotte Gray
programme.desc: A resourceful Scottish woman signs up with British Intelligence to find her missing pilot lover. Working undercover as a French housekeeper, she becomes drawn to a mysterious Resistance fighter and pursued by a sinister Nazi collaborator, requiring the plucky patriot to dig deep into her reservoirs of self-sacrifice.

programme.title: The Karate Kid (2010)
programme.desc: Dre, a young boy, finds himself bullied by Cheng, a rebellious kung fu prodigy at his school. However, things change after he befriends Mr Han, a maintenance man, who happens to be a kung fu expert.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood thought he saved the world when he destroyed his most infamous invention - a machine that turned water into food causing cheeseburger rain and spaghetti tornadoes. But Flint soon learns that his invention survived and is now combining food and animals to create 'foodimals'! Flint and his friends embark on an adventurously mouth-watering mission to battle hungry tacodiles, shrimpanzees, hippotatomuses, cheesepiders and other foodimals to save the world - again!

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sets Smurfette, and her best friends Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty, on an exciting and thrilling race through the Forbidden Forest, filled with magical creatures, to find a mysterious lost village before the evil wizard Gargamel does. Embarking on a roller-coaster journey full of action and danger, the Smurfs are on a course that leads to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: An upper crust rodent lost in London's sewers gets a savvy female rat to save him from Le Frog, a French mercenary.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: An upper crust rodent lost in London's sewers gets a savvy female rat to save him from Le Frog, a French mercenary.

programme.title: Richard the Stork and the Mystery of ...
programme.desc: Little sparrow Richard meets a flock of sparrows who are being held captive by the peacock Zamano. To regain their freedom, they have to go on a great adventure together and find a mysterious treasure.

programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: Boog plans an annual hunting trip for his woodland buddies but they choose family obligations which made Boog take a trip on his own leading him to a circus. He meets with Alistair a devious grizzly who wants to get out of the circus so he convinces Boog to switch places for his life in the wild for Alistair's place at the circus. While attending, Boog then falls for an alluring troupe member. Then the greedy circus ringmaster takes advantage of Boog by causing him misery and humiliation. When Boog's pals finds out about his disappearance, they hatch a rescue mission to rescue Boog and his true love.

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: A worker ant changes roles with a soldier ant to woo a forbidden princess.

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: After he is fired from the Anti-Villain League for failing to take down the latest bad guy to threaten humanity, Gru finds himself in the middle of a major identity crisis. When a mysterious stranger shows up to inform Gru that he has a long-lost twin brother who desperately wishes to follow in his twin's despicable footsteps, one former supervillain will rediscover just how good it feels to be bad.

programme.title: The Karate Kid (2010)
programme.desc: Dre, a young boy, finds himself bullied by Cheng, a rebellious kung fu prodigy at his school. However, things change after he befriends Mr Han, a maintenance man, who happens to be a kung fu expert.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2

Flint and his friends embark on an adventurously mouth-watering mission to battle hungry tacodiles, shrimpanzees, hippotatomuses, cheesepiders and other foodimals to save the world - again!

Embarking on a roller-coaster journey full of action and danger, the Smurfs are on a course that leads to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history.

programme.title: Hey Arnold! The Movie
programme.desc: The hood and The Man go head-to-head in this big screen version of the hit cartoon series. Arnold and his multi-ethnic gang must save their neighbourhood from the bulldozers in this refreshingly nuanced charmer featuring the voices of Jennifer Jason Leigh and Christopher Lloyd, among others.

programme.title: Paw Patrol: Ready, Race, Rescue!
programme.desc: It's the Adventure Bay 500! The pups are ready to be the pit crew for their race hero, The Whoosh. When the legendary racer is unable to drive, he calls on Marshall to take the wheel.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: When Po's long-lost panda father suddenly reappears, the reunited duo travels to a secret panda paradise to meet scores of hilarious new panda characters. When the supernatural villain Kai begins to sweep across China defeating all the kung fu masters, Po must do the impossible: learn to train a village full of his fun-loving, clumsy brethren to become the ultimate band of kung fu pandas.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: The inspirational story of a shy Yorkshire piglet who doesn't quite know his place in the world. But when Farmer Hoggett wins him at the county fair, Babe discovers that he can be anything he wants to be - even an award-winning sheepdog. With the help of a delightful assortment of barnyard friends, the heroic little pig is headed for the challenge of his life in this endearing and fun-filled tale the whole family will love.

programme.title: Puss in Boots
programme.desc: Before he met the ogre Shrek, Puss in Boots (voice of Antonio Banderas) had a complicated life in which he was smeared with the blame of a bank robbery in San Ricardo, engineered against Puss' wishes by Humpty Dumpty (Zach Galifianakis), who was captured while trying to escape - thanks to Puss leaving him to his fate in anger. The two lifelong friends break up and it isn't until they re-unite that they trust each other again.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Welcome to the Hotel Transylvania. Dracula, who runs a five-stake resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's daughter.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Young Alan Parrish sits down as a young boy to play a game with his friend, Sarah, and on a roll of the dice is mysteriously transported into the strange jungle realm of Jumanji. There he remains trapped for 26 years, until two newly orphaned children, Judy and Peter, playing in the attic of Alan's childhood home, free the now-adult Alan from the game's clutches. But to defeat Jumanji's encroaching powers, the three reluctant players must find the now-grown Sarah and band together as a makeshift family to finish the game - before it finishes them.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Alex the lion is the king of the urban jungle, the main attraction at New York's Central Park Zoo. He and his best friends, Marty the zebra, Melman the giraffe and Gloria the hippo have spent their whole lives in blissful captivity before an admiring public and with regular meals provided for them. Not content to leave well enough alone, Marty lets his curiosity get the better of him and makes his escape with the help of some prodigious penguins to explore the world.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold are fourth-grade BFFs who love dreaming up funny pranks. One day, they accidentally hypnotise their principal into believing he's a dimwitted hero named Captain Underpants. But when the new schoolteacher turns out to be a disgraced scientist bent on ridding the world of laughter, George, Harold and Captain Underpants must band together to stop his evil agenda.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: Oscar is a fast-talking little fish whose big dreams have a habit of landing him in hot water. Lenny is a great white shark with a sensitive side and a secret: he's a vegetarian.

But when the new schoolteacher turns out to be a disgraced scientist bent on ridding the world of laughter, George, Harold and Captain Underpants must band together to stop his evil agenda.

programme.title: Dora's Enchanted Forest Adventures
programme.desc: Explore the Enchanted Forest with Dora, Boots, and King Unicornio in this trilogy of magical adventures, concluding in an enchanted double-length episode.

programme.title: Chicken Run
programme.desc: While the chickens on evil Mrs Tweedy's farm dream of a better life, a clever hen named Ginger is hatching plans to fly the coop for good. The only problem is, chickens can't fly or can they? Every escape attempt goes fowl until Rocky, a smooth-talking All-American rooster, crash-lands into the coop. It's hardly poultry in motion when Rocky attempts to teach Ginger and her fine feathered friends to fly but, with teamwork, determination and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt in a spectacular bid for freedom! Featuring unforgettable characters, incredible animation and all-star voice talent, this instant classic from the academy Award-winning creators of Wallace & Gromit is eggs-traordinary fun for the whole family!

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: June, an optimistic, imaginative girl, discovers an incredible amusement park called Wonderland hidden in the woods. Wonderland is full of fantastical rides and talking animals, however it is in disarray. June soon discovers that the park came from her imagination and she's the only one who can fix it.

programme.title: PAW PATROL: The Mighty Movie
programme.desc: A meteor crash gives the PAW Patrol pups superpowers, transforming them into the Mighty Pups. But things take a turn for the worse when Humdinger breaks out of jail to steal their superpowers.

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: This film tells the story of the world's first family road trip. When their cave is destroyed, the Crood family must embark on a comedy adventure into strange and spectacular territory in search of a new home. As if patriarch Grug didn't already have enough to handle, it goes from bad to worse when they encounter an imaginative nomad named Guy. With Guy's help the Croods conquer their fear of the outside world and discover that they have exactly what it takes to survive - each other.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: For their eighth fully animated feature, Illumination and Universal Pictures present "The Grinch," based on Dr. Seuss' beloved holiday classic. The Grinch tells the story of a cynical grump who goes on a mission to steal Christmas, only to have his heart changed by a young girl's generous holiday spirit. Funny, heartwarming and visually stunning, it's a universal story about the spirit of Christmas and the indomitable power of optimism.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, is about to have a wild outdoor adventure.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Gru, his adorable girls, and the mischievous Minions are back with a cast of unforgettable new characters in the blockbuster sequel to the worldwide phenomenon. Just as Gru has given up being super-bad to be a super-dad, the Anti-Villain League recruits him to track down a new criminal mastermind and save the world. Partnered with secret agent Lucy Wilde, Gru, along with the wildly unpredictable Minions, must figure out how to keep his cover while also keeping up with his duties as a father. Get ready for more Minion madness.

programme.title: Dora's Royal Rescue
programme.desc: In 'Dora's Royal Rescue,' Dora's a knight and Boots is her squire as they help the noble horse Rocinante, rescue Don Quixote who is imprisoned by Malambruno, an evil wizard, in an abandoned library inside Story Castle.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: An ogre, with the help of an annoying donkey, tries to win back his swamp by returning a princess to a scheming lord.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: The Mallard family embark on a journey south for the winter to Jamaica via New York City, only for their well-laid plans to go awry, leading to new friends and unknown horizons.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: The classic story of loyalty, trust and sacrifice comes to life in this live-action adaptation. Wilbur is a terrific and radiant pig. Once Wilbur moves into a new barn, he begins a friendship with the most unlikely of creatures - a spider named Charlotte - and their bond inspires the animals to come together as a family. When the word gets out that Wilbur's days are numbered, it seems that only a miracle will save his life. A determined Charlotte - who sees miracles in the ordinary - spins words into her web in an effort to convince the farmer that Wilbur is 'some pig' and worth saving.

programme.title: The Croods: A New Age
programme.desc: In search of a new home, the Croods encounter the more sophisticated Betterman family. A new threat forces the two families to set aside their differences to avoid extinction.

programme.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: He's mean and green and he hates the yo-ho-hoing. The Grinch conspires to steal Christmas from Whoville, making off with the presents, decorations, trees and every other joyful thing.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin put their parenting skills to the test in this hilarious caper about two sacked admen and newly stay-at-home dads who open their own day-care centre.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: "Scoob!" reveals how lifelong friends Scooby and Shaggy first met and how they joined with young detectives Fred, Velma and Daphne to form the famous Mystery Inc. Now, with hundreds of cases solved and adventures shared, Scooby and the gang face their biggest, most challenging mystery ever, a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this global "dogpocalypse", the gang discovers that Scooby has a secret legacy and an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: "Scoob!" reveals how lifelong friends Scooby and Shaggy first met and how they joined with young detectives Fred, Velma and Daphne to form the famous Mystery Inc. Now, with hundreds of cases solved and adventures shared, Scooby and the gang face their biggest, most challenging mystery ever, a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this global "dogpocalypse", the gang discovers that Scooby has a secret legacy and an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.

programme.title: Lost in Space
programme.desc: In the not-so distant future, the Earth is on the verge of total collapse. Chosen as the perfect' candidates to colonise space are the Robinson family: Professor John Robinson, his wife Maureen, their daughters - the lovely Doctor Judy Robinson and her dreamy younger sister Penny, and their genius 10-year-old son Will. Their mission: to fly a sleep spaceship to the nearest star, Alpha Centuri, and create a new home for human beings. Assigned to pilot the craft is Major Don West - cute, cocky, but ever so irresistible, especially to Judy. Sabotaging the Robinsons' mission is double crossing spy, Dr Zachary Smith, who tries to re-programme the ship's robot Robbie to destroy the family, but instead sets it off course and out of touch with civilisation. Bloody battles with giant acid-dripping moon spiders, meetings with alien lizard monkeys, and time portals that bring the family face to face with their future selves - are all in store for the Robinsons. All these adventures are just part of a mind-bending rollercoaster ride during which, lost in the darkness of space, they must come together as a family to reach Alpha Centuri before all hope for Planet Earth is gone.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: The Mallard family embark on a journey south for the winter to Jamaica via New York City, only for their well-laid plans to go awry, leading to new friends and unknown horizons.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: The classic story of loyalty, trust and sacrifice comes to life in this live-action adaptation. Wilbur is a terrific and radiant pig. Once Wilbur moves into a new barn, he begins a friendship with the most unlikely of creatures - a spider named Charlotte - and their bond inspires the animals to come together as a family. When the word gets out that Wilbur's days are numbered, it seems that only a miracle will save his life. A determined Charlotte - who sees miracles in the ordinary - spins words into her web in an effort to convince the farmer that Wilbur is 'some pig' and worth saving.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A high velocity comedy about an underdog snail who kicks into overdrive when he miraculously attains the power of super-speed. But after making fast friends with a crew of streetwise, tricked-out es-car-goes, Turbo learns that no one succeeds on their own. So he puts his heart and shell on the line to help his pals achieve their dreams, before Turbo-charging his own impossible dream: winning the Indy 500.

programme.title: PAW Patrol: Jet To The Rescue
programme.desc: When the scheming Duke of Flappington steals a powerful levitation gem from the royal castle and uses its magical powers to raise Barkingburg into the clouds, Skye will need to overcome her fears and lead the team in their biggest aerial rescue yet!

programme.title: Nanny McPhee & The Big Bang
programme.desc: Nanny McPhee appears at the door of a stressed young mother, who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war. But once she's arrived, Nanny McPhee discovers that the children are fighting a war of their own against two spoiled city cousins who have just moved in and refuse to leave.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: "Scoob!" reveals how lifelong friends Scooby and Shaggy first met and how they joined with young detectives Fred, Velma and Daphne to form the famous Mystery Inc. Now, with hundreds of cases solved and adventures shared, Scooby and the gang face their biggest, most challenging mystery ever, a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this global "dogpocalypse", the gang discovers that Scooby has a secret legacy and an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a terrifying storm destroys their home, a speedy sloth named Laura and her kooky family move to the big city in their rusted old food truck hoping to make their business a success.

programme.title: Dinosaur Train: Adventure Island
programme.desc: Dinosaur siblings Buddy, Tiny, Shiny and Don try to reunite with their parents after an earthquake causes theme park robots to go rogue.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee
programme.desc: Move over, Mary Poppins. Nanny McPhee is a wonderfully hideous, mysterious nanny hired to tame seven brats with a feckless father.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a doubting boy boards a magical train that's headed to the North Pole and Santa Claus's home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Clumsy and overweight panda, Po, dreams of becoming a kung fu master.

programme.title: Tom & Jerry
programme.desc: A legendary rivalry re-emerges when Jerry moves into New York City's finest hotel on the eve of the wedding of the century, forcing the desperate event planner to hire Tom to get rid of him. As mayhem ensues, the escalating cat-and-mouse battle soon threatens to destroy her career, the wedding, and possibly the hotel itself.

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: A bee is abuzz over a scandal: people are stealing honey to eat. With the help of a florist, he sues the human race for 'honey laundering'.

programme.title: Under The Boardwalk
programme.desc: When timid Jersey crab Armen meets bold tourist sea crab Ramona, it causes tension in the community. But when the duo are swept away by a storm, they embark on an epic journey to find home.

programme.title: Adventures in Zambezia

programme.title: The Polar Express

programme.title: Dora's Christmas Carol Adventure
programme.desc: Santa has warned Swiper again and again. If he keeps swiping on Christmas, he'll be permanently put on the naughty list. Will the Christmas tree star and party be ruined?

programme.title: Tom & Jerry

programme.title: Under The Boardwalk

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Alex the lion is the king of the urban jungle, the main attraction at New York's Central Park Zoo. He and his best friends, Marty the zebra, Melman the giraffe and Gloria the hippo have spent their whole lives in blissful captivity before an admiring public and with regular meals provided for them. Not content to leave well enough alone, Marty lets his curiosity get the better of him and makes his escape with the help of some prodigious penguins to explore the world.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: A tale which follows the adventures of a wild and rambunctious mustang stallion as he journeys through the untamed American frontiers, encountering man for the first time, Spirit defies being broken, even as he develops a remarkable friendship with a young Lakota brave named Little Creek. The young stallion also finds love with a beautiful paint mare named Rain on his way to becoming one of the greatest unsung heroes of the Old West.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: The Cat in the Hat who goes by that name is played by Mike Myers of comedy fame! It starts with two kids on a cold, cold wet day their mum is at work and they've no games to play! Then in walks the fun in the form of a Cat who pulls out the laughs from the brim of his hat. Things really get wild when the Cat and his crew (who go by the name of Thing One and Thing Two) take over the house of Conrad and Sally in this fine family film that's right up your alley!

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: Curse Of Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit's latest enterprise is Anti-Pesto, pest control with a heart. When called upon by the dotty Lady Tottington to solve her rabbit infestation, Wallace tangles with her Ladyship's would-be suitor, rotten cad Victor Quartermaine. At first Wallace and Gromit seem to have things in hand. But Wallace's mind transference device malfunctions, and he's in danger of being bagged by Quartermaine. Wallace teeters perilously close to disaster and his four-legged pal, Gromit, faces almost insurmountable odds to save the day!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po is now living his dream as The Dragon Warrior. But his new life is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain, who plans to use a secret weapon to conquer China.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, things are about to take a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: Spring has sprung, and Verne and his woodland friends awaken from their long winter's nap to discover that a large, green hedge has cropped up right through the middle of their once-natural habitat. Enter RJ, an opportunistic raccoon who explains that the world beyond the hedge is 'the gateway to the good life' where peculiar creatures called humans live to eat, rather than eat to live. "For humans," RJ proclaims, "enough is never enough."

programme.title: The Tiger's Apprentice
programme.desc: Tom Lee discovers he is part of a long lineage of magical protectors known as the Guardians. With guidance from a mythical tiger named Hu, Tom trains to take on an evil force that threatens humanity.

programme.title: Richard the Stork and the Mystery of ...
programme.desc: Little sparrow Richard meets a flock of sparrows who are being held captive by the peacock Zamano. To regain their freedom, they have to go on a great adventure together and find a mysterious treasure.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Banning is a 40-year-old corporate takeover lawyer who has lost any memory of being Peter Pan. Peter and his family travel to London to visit Granny Wendy. Peter discovers a note from Captain Hook informing Peter that he has kidnapped his children. With the encouragement of Tinkerbell, Peter once again takes wing, and it's off to Neverland to rescue his kids.

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Storks deliver babies or at least they used to. Now they deliver packages for a global internet retail giant. Junior, the company's top delivery stork, is about to be promoted when he accidentally activates the Baby Making Machine, producing an adorable and wholly unauthorised baby girl.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude. In the film, Peter's feud with Mr. McGregor escalates to greater heights than ever before as they rival for the affections of the warm-hearted animal lover who lives next door.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Recruited from youngsters into the global spy game, four penguins are called into action by a mysterious espionage organisation in order to save the world from a villainous octopus.

programme.title: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
programme.desc: Set sail for a fun-filled voyage and hilarious pirate antics with the biggest band of misfits on the seven seas. When the infamous Pirate Captain is shunned once again by his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz, he sets his sights to win the coveted Pirate of the Year Award. With his trusted dodo, Polly, and ragtag crew at his side, the Pirate Captain will need to battle a diabolical queen, save a young scientist and never lose sight of what a pirate loves best: adventure.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Worried that his half-vampire grandson isn't showing signs of being a vampire, Dracula enlists his friends to put him through 'monster-in-training' boot camp.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: When Po's long-lost panda father suddenly reappears, the reunited duo travels to a secret panda paradise to meet scores of hilarious new panda characters. When the supernatural villain Kai begins to sweep across China defeating all the kung fu masters, Po must do the impossible: learn to train a village full of his fun-loving, clumsy brethren to become the ultimate band of kung fu pandas.

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Megamind is the most brilliant super-villain the world has ever known, and the least successful. Over the years he has tried to conquer Metro City in every imaginable way. Each attempt, a colossal failure thanks to the caped superhero known as Metro Man, until the day Megamind actually defeats him in the throes of one of his botched evil plans. Suddenly, the fate of Metro City is threatened when a new villain arrives and chaos runs rampant, leaving everyone to wonder: can the world's biggest 'mind' actually save the day?

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: An ogre, with the help of an annoying donkey, tries to win back his swamp by returning a princess to a scheming lord.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sets Smurfette, and her best friends Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty, on an exciting and thrilling race through the Forbidden Forest, filled with magical creatures, to find a mysterious lost village before the evil wizard Gargamel does. Embarking on a roller-coaster journey full of action and danger, the Smurfs are on a course that leads to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history.

programme.title: AfrAId
programme.desc: The Curtis family tests a new digital assistant, AIA, which learns their behaviours and anticipates needs. But AIA's protective nature means nothing, or no one, will interfere with them.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: As Arthur Curry confronts the responsibilities of being King of the Seven Seas, a long-buried ancient power is unleashed. After witnessing the full effect of these dark forces, Aquaman must forge an uneasy alliance with an old enemy, and embark on a treacherous journey to protect his family, his kingdom, and the world from irreversible devastation.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Celebrate the life and music of an icon who inspired generations through his message of love, peace, and unity. In this powerful and uplifting film, discover Bob Marley's incredible story of overcoming adversity and the journey behind his revolutionary music that changed the world.

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: World War II veteran Artie Crawford lives in Northern Ireland. After his wife's death, he decides to set off alone to France to attend the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings.

programme.title: My Sailor, My Love
programme.desc: After becoming concerned about her father Howard, Grace hires a caretaker in the form of Annie. As a result of his recluse nature, Howard initially rejects any help from Annie, but gradually the pair begin to bond, and Howard reconsiders opening his heart to love and to be loved once more.

programme.title: Tenor
programme.desc: While working part-time as a food deliveryman, Antoine, an aspiring young rapper from the suburbs of Paris, meets Mrs. Loyseau, an eminent teacher at the Paris Opera. Stunned by the young man's raw talent, she introduces him to the world of opera. As Antoine becomes one of Mrs. Loyseau's students, he hides his new dream from his friends and family, fearing that they won't understand. Somewhere in between the gilded and uptight Parisian upper-class, and the harsh yet free-spirited and familiar suburbs he grew up in, Antoine will have to find his own voice.

programme.title: Daliland
programme.desc: In 1973, a young gallery assistant goes on a wild adventure behind the scenes as he helps the ageing genius Salvador Dali prepare for a big show in New York.

programme.title: Blackberry
programme.desc: Showcases the true story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone, through a ruthlessly competitive Silicon Valley.

programme.title: Uproar
programme.desc: A 17-year-old student is forced to get off the fence he has actively sat on all his life to stand up for himself, his whanau (family) and his future in this story of identity.

programme.title: Relax, I'm from the Future
programme.desc: Casper, a time traveller, arrives in the present with a habit of meeting people he knows are about to die and confessing the truth about himself.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: When a group of friends recklessly violates the sacred rule of Tarot readings, they unknowingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within the cursed cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate and end up in a race against death.

programme.title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
programme.desc: When their car breaks down in an eerie small town, a couple must spend the night in a remote cabin. Panic ensues as they are terrorised by three masked strangers who strike with no mercy.

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she meets three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: Saw X
programme.desc: A sick and desperate John Kramer travels to Mexico for a risky and experimental medical procedure in hopes of a miracle cure for his cancer - only to discover the entire operation is a scam to defraud the vulnerable. Armed with a newfound purpose, the infamous serial killer returns to his work, turning the tables on the con artists in his signature visceral way through devious, deranged, and ingenious traps.

programme.title: Saw X
programme.desc: A sick and desperate John Kramer travels to Mexico for a risky and experimental medical procedure in hopes of a miracle cure for his cancer - only to discover the entire operation is a scam to defraud the vulnerable. Armed with a newfound purpose, the infamous serial killer returns to his work, turning the tables on the con artists in his signature visceral way through devious, deranged, and ingenious traps.

programme.title: There's Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his family to Norway after inheriting a remote estate. However, the family disturbs an unexpected resident: a barn elf who will go to lengths to drive the family away.

programme.title: The Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In France, a woman gets sucked into a world of secrets and betrayal as the battle over her estranged father's massive estate reveals he is more than a genial patriarch.

programme.title: The Forge
programme.desc: A year out of high school with no plans for his future, Isaiah Wright is challenged by his single mother and a successful businessman to start charting a better course for his life in this Christian drama.

programme.title: Whale Nation
programme.desc: A humpback whale is beached on a remote shore. During the fight to save its life, we will discover the story of these extraordinary creatures, denizens of the world's oceans. Inspired by the best-selling book, and exquisitely narrated by Richard E. Grant, Whale Nation takes us on a journey of discovery into the unexplored territories and barely known society of whales, with their remarkable abilities and incredibly rich and complex social lives. A film about life in all its diversity, about human's place on Earth and the vital need for cooperation between the species that share our planet.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station as a conflict breaks out on Earth. Reeling, the U.S. and Russian astronauts receive orders from the ground - take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny Court-Martial
programme.desc: A naval officer stands trial for mutiny after taking command from a ship captain he feels is acting in an unstable way, putting in danger both the ship and its crew.

programme.title: The Passenger
programme.desc: Randy is perfectly content fading into the background. But when his co-worker Benson goes on a sudden and violent rampage leaving a trail of destruction in his wake, Randy is forced to face his fears and confront his troubled past in order to survive.

programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: A father witnesses his son's death in a gang's crossfire on Christmas Eve. While recovering from a wound that costs him his voice, he makes vengeance his life's mission.

programme.title: Dumb Money
programme.desc: The ultimate David versus Goliath story about the insane true story of everyday people who flipped the script on Wall Street and got rich by turning GameStop into the world's hottest company.

programme.title: Unsung Hero
programme.desc: David Smallbone moves his family from Downunder to the States, searching for a brighter future after his successful music company collapses. With nothing more than their seven children, suitcases, and their love of music, David and his pregnant wife Helen set out to rebuild their lives. David and Helen begin to realise the musical prowess in their children, who would go on to become two of the most successful acts in Inspirational Music history.

programme.title: Expend4bles
programme.desc: Armed with every weapon they can get their hands on and the skills to use them, The Expendables are the world's last line of defense and the team that gets called when all other options are off the table. But new team members with new styles and tactics are going to give "new blood" a new meaning.

programme.title: Freelance
programme.desc: An ex-special forces operative takes on a private security gig for a journalist as she interviews a ruthless dictator. When a military coup breaks out, the trio must figure out how to survive the jungle, the assassins, and each other.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as they're pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venom's home world.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as they're pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venom's home world.

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Liam, an aspiring writer, accepts a tutoring position at the family estate of his idol, renowned author JM Sinclair, and his wife Helene.

programme.title: Biosphere
programme.desc: In the not-too-distant future, the last two men on earth must adapt and evolve to save humanity.

programme.title: Origin
programme.desc: Follows the tragedy and triumph of Pulitzer Prize winning journalist Isabel Wilkerson as she investigates a global phenomenon of epic proportions, who experiences unfathomable personal loss and love as she crosses continents and cultures to craft one of the defining American books of our time.

programme.title: Gabon: Earth's Last Chance
programme.desc: This enviro-thriller documentary feature tells the extraordinary story of scientist Professor Lee White from Manchester, who ended up becoming the Environment Minister of Gabon in central Africa.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new home with his family. But a dark secret in the home's past will unleash a malevolent force that will drag the family into the depths of terror.

programme.title: Klitschko: More Than a Fight
programme.desc: Oscar-winning director Kevin MacDonald's portrait of former heavyweight boxing world champion and current Mayor of Kyiv Vitali Klitschko is a riveting account of an extraordinary individual and an urgent engagement with one of the most pressing issues of our time.

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: A young woman named Sam finds herself trapped in New York City during the early stages of an invasion by alien creatures with ultra-sensitive hearing.

programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.desc: Determined to find his missing daughter, Austin detective, Danny Rourke instead finds himself spiraling down a rabbit hole while investigating a series of reality-bending bank robberies where he will ultimately call into question his most basic assumptions about everything and everyone in his world. Aided by Diana Cruz, an unnervingly gifted psychic, Rourke simultaneously pursues and is pursued by a lethal specter, the one man he believes holds the key to finding the missing girl only to discover more than he ever bargained for.

programme.title: Drive-Away Dolls
programme.desc: Free-spirited Jamie and her demure friend, Marian, embark on a road trip to Tallahassee for a fresh start, but things go wrong when they meet inept criminals along the way.

programme.title: Master Gardener
programme.desc: A meticulous horticulturist is devoted to tending the grounds of a beautiful estate and pandering to his employer, the wealthy dowager.

programme.title: Blackberry
programme.desc: Showcases the true story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone, through a ruthlessly competitive Silicon Valley.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: An aspiring actor undergoes a radical medical procedure to transform his appearance. However, his dream face quickly becomes a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what he lost.

programme.title: Daliland
programme.desc: In 1973, a young gallery assistant goes on a wild adventure behind the scenes as he helps the ageing genius Salvador Dali prepare for a big show in New York.

programme.title: Ford V Holden
programme.desc: Narrated by Shane Jacobson, this feature-length documentary that explores the decades-long competition between two of Australia's most iconic brands - Ford and Holden. From the early days of the automobile industry to the present, Ford v Holden delves into the history, technology, and culture of these rival companies and their impact on the Australian psyche and automotive landscape. Aussie blood runs red or blue, which one are you?

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Follows Morris, who must coach a misfit softball team of his fellow housemates during his mandatory stay at Sweet Dreams sober living in order to get his life back on track.

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Comedian Max co-parents autistic son Ezra with ex-wife Jenna. Faced with crucial decisions about Ezra's future, Max and Ezra go on a life-changing cross-country road trip.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: A young boy who, in writing his yearly note to Santa, mixes up the letters and sends it to Satan instead.

programme.desc: In France, a woman gets sucked into a world of secrets and betrayal as the battle over her estranged father's massive estate reveals he is more than a genial patriarch.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser finds a renewed sense of purpose when she meets a widowed father and his two daughters.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Celebrate the life and music of an icon who inspired generations through his message of love, peace, and unity. In this powerful and uplifting film, discover Bob Marley's incredible story of overcoming adversity and the journey behind his revolutionary music that changed the world.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: Set during the tense 19 days of the Yom Kippur War in 1973. Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir is faced with the potential of Israel's complete destruction, and must navigate overwhelming odds, a skeptical cabinet, and a complex relationship with US Secretary of State Henry Kissinger. Her tough leadership and compassion would ultimately decide the fate of her nation and leave her with a controversial legacy around the world.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Snowbound at their high school reunion, former classmates uncover a murder and scramble to identify the killer among them before they're all iced out for good.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an eight-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken family's history.

programme.title: The Parenting
programme.desc: Boyfriends Rohan and Josh plan a perfect weekend getaway in the country to introduce their parents. But as tensions begin to flare between the more traditional Sharon and Frank, and the laid-back Liddy and Cliff, the families soon realise that their rental, managed by eccentric local Brenda, is haunted by the presence of a 400-year-old poltergeist. When one parent becomes thoroughly possessed, it's up to the young couple and their meddlesome BFF Sara to unite the families and stop the evil entity once and for all.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Dune: Part Two will explore the mythic journey of Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.
