Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Expend4bles
programme.desc: Armed with every weapon they can get their hands on and the skills to use them, The Expendables are the world's last line of defense and the team that gets called when all other options are off the table. But new team members with new styles and tactics are going to give "new blood" a new meaning.

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: Adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. However, as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of LA, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past.

programme.title: The Parenting
programme.desc: Boyfriends Rohan and Josh plan a perfect weekend getaway in the country to introduce their parents. But as tensions begin to flare between the more traditional Sharon and Frank, and the laid-back Liddy and Cliff, the families soon realise that their rental, managed by eccentric local Brenda, is haunted by the presence of a 400-year-old poltergeist. When one parent becomes thoroughly possessed, it's up to the young couple and their meddlesome BFF Sara to unite the families and stop the evil entity once and for all.

programme.title: Immaculate
programme.desc: Cecilia, a woman of devout faith, is warmly welcomed to the picture-perfect Italian countryside where she is offered a new role at an illustrious convent. But it becomes clear to Cecilia that her new home harbors dark and horrifying secrets.

programme.title: The Heist Before Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating boy meets two Santas in the woods, one of whom claims to have fallen from his sleigh, but he is more interested in the other man when he learns he is on the run for robbing a bank.

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: When 93-year-old Thelma Post gets duped by a phone scammer pretending to be her grandson, she sets out on a treacherous quest across the city to reclaim what was taken from her.

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Liam, an aspiring writer, accepts a tutoring position at the family estate of his idol, renowned author JM Sinclair, and his wife Helene.

programme.title: The Parenting
programme.desc: Boyfriends Rohan and Josh plan a perfect weekend getaway in the country to introduce their parents. But as tensions begin to flare between the more traditional Sharon and Frank, and the laid-back Liddy and Cliff, the families soon realise that their rental, managed by eccentric local Brenda, is haunted by the presence of a 400-year-old poltergeist. When one parent becomes thoroughly possessed, it's up to the young couple and their meddlesome BFF Sara to unite the families and stop the evil entity once and for all.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an eight-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken family's history.

programme.title: Something In The Water
programme.desc: A dream wedding turns into a nightmare when five girlfriends fight for their lives in open water.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: As the world fell, young Furiosa is snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers and falls into the hands of a great biker horde led by the warlord Dementus. Sweeping through the Wasteland, they come across the Citadel presided over by The Immortan Joe. While the two tyrants war for dominance, Furiosa must survive many trials as she puts together the means to find her way home.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British family's idyllic country estate.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show - a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show - a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: When a group of friends recklessly violates the sacred rule of Tarot readings, they unknowingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within the cursed cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate and end up in a race against death.

programme.title: Apartment 7A
programme.desc: New York City, 1965. What happened in the apartment before Rosemary moved in? A struggling dancer finds herself drawn into dark forces by a peculiar couple promising her fame.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A preacher's violent past is drawn into question and his faith tested as he becomes caught up in a bloody war between Maori tribes after arriving at a British settlement in the 1830s.

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: A homeless veteran gets caught up in the world of underground fight clubs.

programme.title: Strange Way of Life
programme.desc: After 25 years, Silva rides a horse across the desert to visit his friend Sheriff Jake. They celebrate the meeting, but the next morning Jake tells him the reason for his trip.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as they're pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venom's home world.

programme.title: AfrAId
programme.desc: The Curtis family tests a new digital assistant, AIA, which learns their behaviours and anticipates needs. But AIA's protective nature means nothing, or no one, will interfere with them.

programme.title: There's Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his family to Norway after inheriting a remote estate. However, the family disturbs an unexpected resident: a barn elf who will go to lengths to drive the family away.

programme.title: It Ends with Us
programme.desc: Lily overcomes a traumatic childhood to embark on a new life. A meeting with a neurosurgeon sparks a connection but Lily begins to see sides of him that remind her of her parents' relationship.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British family's idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: If
programme.desc: A young girl who goes through a difficult experience begins to see everyone's imaginary friends who have been left behind as their real-life friends have grown up.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, an enchanting adventure about a lost penguin rescued from an oil spill, who transforms the life of a heartbroken fisherman. They soon become unlikely friends, so bonded that even the vast ocean cannot divide them.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside of his book, adventurous Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the book's pages and into the physical world, Harold finds he has a lot to learn about real life.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: A Mexican-American college grad's life is turned upside down when a mysterious scarab gives him the ability to generate an exoskeleton suit of incredible power.

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two middle-aged loafers are forced to live together when their parents get married. When the reluctant step-siblings' immature antics over TV privileges and personal property take their toll on the marriage, the devious duo hatch a hysterical scheme to reunite the couple.

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: The new adventure begins when a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all active undercover agents in Britain, leaving Johnny English as the secret service's last hope. Called out of retirement, English dives head first into action with the mission to find the mastermind hacker. As a man with few skills and analogue methods, Johnny English must overcome the challenges of modern technology to make this mission a success.

programme.title: American Pie: The Wedding
programme.desc: Stifler takes centre stage in the funniest and grossest sequel to the American Pie series. Jim and Michelle's wedding plans are rushed through and nothing goes smoothly in this instalment that will have you rolling in the aisles This farcical conclusion to the breakthrough series has enough poo jokes, pre-wedding crimes against nature and goofiness to keep die-hard Pie-eaters coming back for more.

programme.title: Holmes and Watson
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson join forces to solve a murder at Buckingham Palace. They soon realise that they only have 5760 minutes to solve the case, or the Queen will be next.

programme.title: Holmes and Watson
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson join forces to solve a murder at Buckingham Palace. They soon realise that they only have 5760 minutes to solve the case, or the Queen will be next.

programme.title: The Little Hours
programme.desc: In this unapologetically raunchy comedy set in the Middle Ages, a group of repressed nuns are tempted by a young and handsome servant who is hired as the convent's new labourer.

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: Now that Mac and Kelly Radner have a second baby on the way, they are ready to make the final move into adulthood: the suburbs. But just as they thought they'd reclaimed the neighbourhood and were safe to sell, they learn that the new occupants next door are a sorority even more out of control than Teddy and his brothers ever dreamed of being. Tired of their school's sexist, restrictive system, the unorthodox ladies of Kappa Nu have decided to start a house where they can do whatever the hell they want. When Shelby and her sisters, Beth and Nora, find the perfect place just off campus, they won't let the fact that its located on a quiet street stand in their way of parties as epic as the guys throw.

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Get ready for a gut-busting, bone-mashing good time in this hilarious horror comedy. There comes a day in every man's life when he has to get off the couch and kill some zombies. When flesh-eating zombies are on the hunt for a bite to eat, it's up to slacker Shaun and his best pal to save their friends and family from becoming the next entree.

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two middle-aged loafers are forced to live together when their parents get married. When the reluctant step-siblings' immature antics over TV privileges and personal property take their toll on the marriage, the devious duo hatch a hysterical scheme to reunite the couple.

programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
programme.desc: A delightful comedy about finding love in the most unexpected places. Two successful New Yorkers, Paul and Meryl, are at their wits' end with repairing their strained marriage. But when they become the only witnesses to a brutal murder, the police hide them away in Wyoming, together. Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: Four bickering couples embark on a journey to a tropical island resort. While one of the couples is there to work on their marriage, the other three set out to enjoy some fun in the sun.

programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Andy Stitzer has done quite a few things in his life. He's got a cushy job stamping invoices at an electronics superstore, a nice apartment with a proud collection of action figures and comic books, good friends, a nice attitude. But there's just one little thing he hasn't quite gotten around to doing yet - something most people have done by his age. Done a lot. Andy's never, ever, ever had sex - not even by accident. So is that such a big deal? Well, for Andy's buds at the store, it sure is. Although they think he's a bit of an oddball, there's certainly a planet full of stranger (and homelier) guys who've at least had one go at having a go. They consider it their duty to help Andy out of his dire situation and go to great lengths to help him.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: When he is ruled to be property and not a person, a foul-mouthed teddy bear seeks the aid of a legendary civil rights attorney to gain the justice he deserves.

programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: Seth Rogen and James Franco channel Cheech and Chong in this hilarious comedy where lazy stoner Dale Denton (Rogen) becomes the only witness to a murder by a crooked cop and the city's most dangerous drug lord. Denton immediately heads to dealer Saul Silver's place and now they're up to their neck in all kinds of trouble and must run for their lives with the mobsters hot on their trail and out to silence them forever.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: This film follows devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon as he butts heads with a brash new recruit. Together, they uncover a local criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay. For a generation of TV fans the world over, the name Baywatch conjures up images of sun, surf and statuesque lifeguards, running in slow-motion in form-fitting red swimsuits.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. But at the biggest nuptials of the year, John breaks the rules and falls for the daughter of the US Secretary of Treasury, and Jeremy is left at the mercy of her "stage-five-clinger" sister. Being there for his buddy, Jeremy follows John to the family's huge estate for a weekend that may even be too wild for these professional party guys.

programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: John Clasky is a devoted dad whose skills as a chef have afforded his family a very upscale life, including a summer home in Malibu and a breathtaking new housekeeper, Flor, who has recently immigrated to L.A. from Mexico, and is trying to find a better life for her remarkable daughter, Cristina, who is rapidly embracing the American way of life. When Flor and Cristina move in with the Claskys for the summer, Flor has to fight for her daughter's soul as she discovers that life in a new country is perilous especially when you're being embraced by an affluent, eccentric American family!

programme.title: The Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: America's funniest family back for seconds! The hilarity begins when professor Sherman Klump finds romance with fellow DNA specialist, Denise Gaines, and discovers a brilliant formula that reverses ageing. But Sherman's thin and obnoxious alter ego, Buddy Love, wants out and a big piece of the action. And when Buddy gets loose, things get seriously nutty. Now, it's up to Mama, Papa, Ernie and Granny Klump to throw their weight around and save the day in this whopping, gut-busting comedy.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: This film follows devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon as he butts heads with a brash new recruit. Together, they uncover a local criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay. For a generation of TV fans the world over, the name Baywatch conjures up images of sun, surf and statuesque lifeguards, running in slow-motion in form-fitting red swimsuits.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Misfit NYPD detectives, Gamble and Hoitz, are sentenced to life behind the desk. They hate each other and the monotony of their meaningless jobs, as they're forced to live in the shadow of the two biggest and most badass cops on the force. But when those guys go down for the count, opportunity knocks for Gamble and Hoitz. Stumbling onto what could be one of the biggest crimes in years, can the other guys step up their game to solve the case without killing each other and destroying NYC in the process?

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Allison Scott is an up-and-coming entertainment journalist whose 24-year-old life is on the fast track. But it gets seriously derailed when a drunken one-night stand with slacker Ben Stone results in an unexpected pregnancy. Faced with the prospect of going it alone or getting to know the baby's father, Allison decides to give the lovable layabout a chance. An overgrown kid with no desire to settle down, Ben learns he has a big decision to make with his kid's mother-to-be: will he run or stay?

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
programme.desc: When a single mother and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who can't be stopped - but he's making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: CHIPS
programme.desc: When an inexperienced rookie and a hardened pro in the Highway Patrol are teamed together, they clash more than click, kick-starting a partnership that is easier said than done.

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: Grizzled former professional baseball player Morris Buttermaker (Billy Bob Thornton) is recruited by a strait-laced lawyer (Marcia Gay Harden) to coach the Bears, a woefully inept Little League team. He's got to find a way to drive this gang of 12 misfits to a championship against their hated rivals: the Yankees and their overbearing coach (Greg Kinnear). A hilarious homage to an irreverent 1976 comedy, THE BAD NEWS BEARS.

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: Evan Danielson finds it difficult to connect with his seven-year-old daughter, Olivia. Evan is too distracted by his career demands to understand the value of quality father-daughter time, and Olivia has all but given up on her father. When the promotion of a lifetime is suddenly within his reach, Evan finds himself torn between his parental responsibilities and staving off his company rival, the annoyingly pseudo-mystical Johnny Whitefeather. Evan has always been a man in complete control, but when he really starts to lose it, Olivia steps in with her own bit of advice: winning stock tips courtesy of the princesses and queen who she visits through her security blanket, her 'Goo-Gaa'.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Dr Sherman Klump, a kind, calorically challenged genetics professor who longs to shed his 400-pound frame in order to win the heart of the beautiful Carla Purty. So, with one swig of his experimental fat-reducing serum, Sherman becomes Buddy Love, a fast-talking, pumped up, plumped-down Don Juan. Can Sherman stop his buff alter ego before it's too late, or will Buddy have the last laugh?

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Sent to prison for insider trading, a titan of industry emerges ready to rebrand herself as America's latest sweetheart, but not everyone is so quick to forgive and forget.

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: Deuce's European vacation riot goes from gigolo school in England to Amsterdam. He's on the trail of a killer who's knocking off the city's greatest gigolos.

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: When Albert loses his girlfriend to his moustached nemesis, a mysterious and beautiful woman rides into town and turns his luck around. But when her notorious outlaw husband arrives seeking revenge, Albert must put his new-found courage to the test.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who can't be stopped - but he's making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Chuck Levine and Larry Valentine are fire fighters and true-blue buddies. When Larry, a widower, learns he cannot name his children as beneficiaries on his life insurance policy, he needs a big favour from Chuck: Sign on as Larry's domestic partner. The pals unexpectedly become front-page news and must carry the masquerade to extremes when an overzealous bureaucrat becomes suspicious of their true relationship.

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: A hilarious, heartfelt look at one guy's arduous quest to grow up and get over the heartbreak of being dumped. Struggling musician Peter, after he is jilted by his television star girlfriend Sarah for another guy, runs off to Hawaii on a vacation only to find his ex staying in the same hotel with her new man.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. Now the first cadets, a collection of oddballs, eccentrics and misfits will soon be let loose on the streets. That is if they somehow manage to graduate in this worldwide hit comedy that started the series of Police Academy films.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: When accidentally destroying his workplace gets successful salesman Teddy fired, he can't find another decent job unless he finally gets his GED. But two major things stand in his way: Carrie, a teacher with no time for grown-up class clowns, and Stewart, Teddy's high school nemesis-turned-principal who will do anything to see him fail. Now every school rule is about to be broken when they all go head-to-head in a wild battle of wits, pranks, and lessons you can't learn in books. Night School is in session!

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Kurt and Dale decide to become their own bosses and launch their own business. Soon, though, a slick investor pulls the rug out from under them. Outplayed and desperate, and with no legal recourse, the three would-be entrepreneurs hatch a misguided plan to kidnap the investor's adult son and ransom him to regain control of their company.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Male nurse Greg Focker is poised to propose to his girlfriend Pam during a weekend stay at her parents' home. But here's the catch he needs to ask her father first. Alas, the fur flies as Jack Byrnes, Pam's cat-crazy, ex-CIA father takes an immediate dislike to her less-than-truthful beau. Greg's quest for approval gets seriously side-tracked as Murphy's Law takes over and a hilarious string of mishaps turns him into a master of disaster and total pariah in the eyes of the entire family, all except for his shell-shocked girlfriend, who can't believe she still lovers her one-man wrecking crew.

programme.title: Police Academy

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Twenty-seven-year-old Billy Madison must repeat all 12 grades of school in just 24 weeks to earn his father's respect, and prove he has what it takes to run the family's multimillion-dollar empire. Along the way, Billy falls for his third grade teacher, gets kicked out of school and must face off with his nemesis, not to mention a pesky penguin.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant whose glory days are behind him, bumps into a formerly nerdy classmate and is pulled into the high-stakes world of international espionage.

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Get ready for a gut-busting, bone-mashing good time in this hilarious horror comedy. There comes a day in every man's life when he has to get off the couch and kill some zombies. When flesh-eating zombies are on the hunt for a bite to eat, it's up to slacker Shaun and his best pal to save their friends and family from becoming the next entree.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant whose glory days are behind him, bumps into a formerly nerdy classmate and is pulled into the high-stakes world of international espionage.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant whose glory days are behind him, bumps into a formerly nerdy classmate and is pulled into the high-stakes world of international espionage.

programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
programme.desc: A delightful comedy about finding love in the most unexpected places. Two successful New Yorkers, Paul and Meryl, are at their wits' end with repairing their strained marriage. But when they become the only witnesses to a brutal murder, the police hide them away in Wyoming, together. Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Clear the runway for Derek Zoolander, VH1's three-time male model of the year but his face falls when hippie-chic 'he's so hot right now' Hansel scooters in to steal this year's award. The evil fashion guru Mugatu seizes the opportunity to turn Derek into a killing machine. It's a well-designed conspiracy and only with the help of Hansel and a few well-chosen accessories can Derek make the world safe.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each other's existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Misfit NYPD detectives, Gamble and Hoitz, are sentenced to life behind the desk. They hate each other and the monotony of their meaningless jobs, as they're forced to live in the shadow of the two biggest and most badass cops on the force. But when those guys go down for the count, opportunity knocks for Gamble and Hoitz. Stumbling onto what could be one of the biggest crimes in years, can the other guys step up their game to solve the case without killing each other and destroying NYC in the process?

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Nerdy college student Columbus has survived the plague that has turned mankind into flesh-devouring zombies because he's scared of just about everything. Gun-toting, Twinkie-loving Tallahassee has no fears. Together, they are about to stare down their most horrifying challenge yet: each other's company.

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Get ready for a gut-busting, bone-mashing good time in this hilarious horror comedy. There comes a day in every man's life when he has to get off the couch and kill some zombies. When flesh-eating zombies are on the hunt for a bite to eat, it's up to slacker Shaun and his best pal to save their friends and family from becoming the next entree.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A fast talking con-artist Rayford Gibson and conservative bank teller Claude Banks are accidently teamed up to become the funniest odd couple east of the Mississippi. In an effort to pay off Ray's debt and restore Claude's reputation, they travel south on a bootlegging run for some quick cash. There is no limit to their comical misfortune as they are placed at the scene of a crime and their mistaken identity lands them right in the front of the judge. The hysterical comedy gives a whole new meaning to friends for life.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. But at the biggest nuptials of the year, John breaks the rules and falls for the daughter of the US Secretary of Treasury, and Jeremy is left at the mercy of her "stage-five-clinger" sister. Being there for his buddy, Jeremy follows John to the family's huge estate for a weekend that may even be too wild for these professional party guys.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his step-father Frank Powell, who's a real jerk. Frank picks on Rod, tosses him around like a rag doll in their weekly sparring sessions and definitely doesn't respect him, much less his stunts - as he says, 'you never sneak up on a man whose been in a chemical fire'. But when Frank falls ill, it's up to Rod to stage the stunt jump of his life in order to raise the money for Frank's heart operation and save him.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: This film follows devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon as he butts heads with a brash new recruit. Together, they uncover a local criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay. For a generation of TV fans the world over, the name Baywatch conjures up images of sun, surf and statuesque lifeguards, running in slow-motion in form-fitting red swimsuits.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: Brad Taggart is a kind-hearted radio executive who wants to be the best possible stepfather to his wife's two children. When her freewheeling ex-husband Dusty breezes back into town, Brad's feeling of insecurity quickly develops into an inferiority complex. As Dusty demonstrates his flair for athletics, home repair and bad-boy charisma, Taggart finds himself in a no-holds-barred battle to one-up his rival and win the approval of his family.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: With a heart that won't quit, a stomach that won't stop gurgling and a self-sworn oath to protect his turf, he's Paul Blart: Mall Cop. Mild-mannered Paul Blart has always had huge dreams of becoming a State Trooper. Until then, he patrols the local mall as a security guard. With his closely cropped moustache, personal transporter and gung-ho attitude, only Blart seems to take his job seriously. All that changes when a team of thugs raid the mall and take hostages. Untrained, unarmed and a super-size target, Blart has to become a real cop to save the day.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A has-been scientist, Dr Rick Marshall, gets more than he bargained for when his expedition takes a wrong turn into the Land of the Lost. Now, Marshall, his crack-smart research assistant, Holly, and a redneck survivalist named Will have no weapons, few skills and questionable smarts to survive in a world full of marauding dinosaurs, fantastic creatures and laugh-out-loud comedy.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A fast talking con-artist Rayford Gibson and conservative bank teller Claude Banks are accidently teamed up to become the funniest odd couple east of the Mississippi. In an effort to pay off Ray's debt and restore Claude's reputation, they travel south on a bootlegging run for some quick cash. There is no limit to their comical misfortune as they are placed at the scene of a crime and their mistaken identity lands them right in the front of the judge. The hysterical comedy gives a whole new meaning to friends for life.

Being there for his buddy, Jeremy follows John to the family's huge estate for a weekend that may even be too wild for these professional party guys.

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: Deuce's European vacation riot goes from gigolo school in England to Amsterdam. He's on the trail of a killer who's knocking off the city's greatest gigolos.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: He's the best there is. In fact, he's the only one there is! He's Ace Ventura Pet Detective and he's on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eyeball to eyeball with a man-eating shark, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. Whether he's undercover, under fire or underwater, he always gets his man or beast.

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: When Albert loses his girlfriend to his moustached nemesis, a mysterious and beautiful woman rides into town and turns his luck around. But when her notorious outlaw husband arrives seeking revenge, Albert must put his new-found courage to the test.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: Brad Taggart is a kind-hearted radio executive who wants to be the best possible stepfather to his wife's two children. When her freewheeling ex-husband Dusty breezes back into town, Brad's feeling of insecurity quickly develops into an inferiority complex. As Dusty demonstrates his flair for athletics, home repair and bad-boy charisma, Taggart finds himself in a no-holds-barred battle to one-up his rival and win the approval of his family.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: With a heart that won't quit, a stomach that won't stop gurgling and a self-sworn oath to protect his turf, he's Paul Blart: Mall Cop. Mild-mannered Paul Blart has always had huge dreams of becoming a State Trooper. Until then, he patrols the local mall as a security guard. programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A has-been scientist, Dr Rick Marshall, gets more than he bargained for when his expedition takes a wrong turn into the Land of the Lost. Now, Marshall, his crack-smart research assistant, Holly, and a redneck survivalist named Will have no weapons, few skills and questionable smarts to survive in a world full of marauding dinosaurs, fantastic creatures and laugh-out-loud comedy.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: After his dream of stardom on the hockey ice melts, Happy Gilmore discovers he has a gift that could bring him glory on the greens. Trouble is, with his hot head and hard-hitting drives, Happy doesn't just play golf, he destroys it. With the help of a retired golfer and hot publicist, can Happy perfect his game and tame his temper to win the tournament prize money?

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Life flips over for a small-town pizzeria owner and poet who inherits $40 billion. Sleazy moguls come to whisk him and his money away to corporate America.

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: Upon realising that he has no male friends close enough to serve as his best man, a husband-to-be immediately embarks on a series of bizarre and awkward man-dates to find such a friend.

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: Now that Mac and Kelly Radner have a second baby on the way, they are ready to make the final move into adulthood: the suburbs. But just as they thought they'd reclaimed the neighbourhood and were safe to sell, they learn that the new occupants next door are a sorority even more out of control than Teddy and his brothers ever dreamed of being. Tired of their school's sexist, restrictive system, the unorthodox ladies of Kappa Nu have decided to start a house where they can do whatever the hell they want. When Shelby and her sisters, Beth and Nora, find the perfect place just off campus, they won't let the fact that its located on a quiet street stand in their way of parties as epic as the guys throw.

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch
programme.desc: One of television's most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken 'Hutch' Hutchinson as they're paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant, Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal, Reese Feldman.

programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: When accidentally destroying his workplace gets successful salesman Teddy fired, he can't find another decent job unless he finally gets his GED. But two major things stand in his way: Carrie, a teacher with no time for grown-up class clowns, and Stewart, Teddy's high school nemesis-turned-principal who will do anything to see him fail. Now every school rule is about to be broken when they all go head-to-head in a wild battle of wits, pranks, and lessons you can't learn in books. Night School is in session!

programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: When grandfather Ed moves in, Peter is forced to give up his bedroom. Unwilling to tolerate this injustice, Peter devises a series of pranks to drive him out.
